APR yakuye amanota atatu kuri Musanze, iyobora urutonde rwa Shampiona
Ku munota wa 30 w’umukino ni bwo APR yafunguye amazamu ku gitego cyatsinzwe na Nshuti Dominique Savio, itsinda icya kabiri ku munota wa 61, aba akaba ari nabo bayitsindiye ku mukino wa mbere wa Shampiona.
Masudi atangiye Shampiona atakaza amanota
Undi mukino wabereye kuri Stade ya Kirehe, ikipe ya AS Kigali ubu iri gutozwa na Masudi Djuma, yanganyije ubusa ku busa na Kirehe.
I Nyagatare ya Sunrise yahatsindiye ikipe ya Gicumbi igitego 1-0, igitego cyatsinzwe na Samson Obua, nyuma gato ahita ahabwa n’ikarita itukura.
Mu karere ka Bugesera, ikipe ya Etincelles ntiyahiriwe n’uyu mukino aho yaje gutsindwa igitego 1-0 cyatsinzwe na Niyitegeka Idrissa.
I Nyagisenyi mu karere ka Nyamagabe, Amagaju yahanganyirije igitego 1-1 na Muhanga, ibitego byatsinzwe na Hakundukize Adolphe ku ruhande rwa Muhanga, Amagaju yishyurirwa na Ndikumana Tresor kuri Penaliti.
Uko imikino y’umunsi wa kabiri wa Shampiona yagenze
Ku wa Gatanu

Perezida wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelenskyy, yashinje u Burusiya gukina n’ubuzima bw’imfungwa z’intambara z’Abanya-Ukraine nyuma y’uko indege yari itwaye 65 isandariye hafi y’umupaka w’iki Gihugu, abari bayirimo bose bakahasiga ubuzima.
Perezida wa Ukraine, Volodymyr Zelensky, yashinje u Burusiya “gukina n’ubuzima bw’imfungwa z’intambara z’Abanya-Ukraine”, nyuma y’impanuka y’indege yabereye mu burengerazuba bw’u Burusiya.
Zelensky yasabye ko hakorwa iperereza mpuzamahanga kuri iyi mpanuka yabaye kuri uyu wa Gatatu tariki 24 Mutarama 2024, ibera mu gace ka Belgorod hafi y’umupaka wa Ukraine.
U Burusiya bwavuze ko iyo ndege yo mubwoko bwa Il-76 yari irimo imfungwa z’intambara 65 zo muri Ukraine, abakozi batandatu b’u Burusiya n’abaherekeza batatu, ndetse bwemeje ko bose nta n’umwe warokotse
Moscow yavuze ko abo Banya-Ukraine bari bajyanywe mu rwego rwo guhanahana imfungwa.
Inzego z’igisirikare cya Ukraine zatangaje ko zitigeze zihabwa amakuru ngo zirinde umutekano wo mu kirere nk’uko byakozwe mbere.
Prezida Zelenskyy yagize ati “biragaragara ko Abarusiya bari gukinira ku buzima bw’imfungwa z’intambara z’Abanya-Ukraine, barakina n’amarangamutima y’abavandimwe babo n’umuryango mugari wacu.”
inzego z’iperereza za Ukraine zavuze ko kutazimenyesha ngo hacungwe umutekano wo mu kirere mu masaha yateganyijwe bivuze ko bashaka gushyira ubuzima bw’izo mfungwa mu kaga.
Shemsa UWIMANA
RADIOTV10

Umutegetsi mu muryango w’Ubumwe bwa Afurika( AU/UA) yabwiye BBC ko umugambi washyizweho wo gusaranganya inkingo za Coronavirus mu bihugu bikennye wateguwe ushingiye “cyane ku bitekerezo bya Gikolonize”.
Ibi, Dr Ayoade Alakija, wungirije umuyobozi w’ihuriro rya Afurika rishinzwe gutanga inkingo (Africa Union Africa Vaccine Delivery Alliance for COVID-19, Auvda), yabivuze bucya haba inama ihuza ibihugu bikize kurusha ibindi ku Isi (G7), aho byitezwe ko abategetsi b’ibi bihugu bazatangaza umugambi 
... 
shinzwe hisunzwe ivyiyumviro/ibitekerezo bya gikoloni. Ntibigeze baza kutubaza twebwe abanya Afrika, ntibigeze baza kubaza abatuyobora, ntibigeze baza kubaza abanyagihugu bacu. ‘None ushaka bigende gute?’ “.
Dr Alakija, avuga ko iyo baza kubaza, Auvda yari kubabwira ko yifuza gukingira hagati ya 60% na 80% by’abanyagihugu ba Afrika. Avuga ko Covax ubwayo isa n’iyibaza ko gukingira 20% by’abanyagihugu bose ba Afrika bizaba bihagije.
Avuga ko uyu mugambi wonyine udashobora gukemura ibibazo by’inki
...
we ko Covax ihagije”.
Akomeza ati” Uriyicarira aho ukareka ngo Covax izaguha ibyo ukeneye byose”. Muri kino gihe nkuko BBC ikomeza ibitangaza, hari impungenge zigenda ziyongera ko ikena ry’inkingo mu bihugu byinshi bya Afrika ririmo riradindiza igihe cyo gutanga inking zigira kabiri za Covid.
Umuryango w’Abibumbye-ONU hamwe n’ikigo cya Afrika gishinzwe kurwanya indwara (CDC) basaba ibihugu bifite inkingo z’umurengera ko byazitanga mu turere twa Afrika tuzikeneye.
Munyaneza Theogene / intyoza.com

Nana Kwaku Bonsam, Umugabo ukomoka mu gihugu cya Ghana uzwiho gukoresha amarozi ubu aratangaza ko yifashishije ubushobozi bw’uburozi bwe yamaze kuroga Umukinnyi Cristiano Ronaldo ukinira ikipe y’igihugu ya Portugal kugirango atazabasha gukina imikino y’igikombe cy’Isi bazanahuramo n’ikipe ya Ghana.
Nana Kwaku Bonsam, avuga ko rwose ari inyuma y’ikomereka ryo ku itako ndetse no mu ivi ry’ibumoso ry’umukinnyi Cristiano Ronaldo ubusanzwe ukinira ikipe ya Real Madrid ndetse n’ikipe y’igihugu ya Portugal akaba yizeza ab anya Ghana ko uyu mukinnyi atazaboneka mu gikombe cy’isi.
Ubusanzwe ikipe y’igihugu ya Ghana igomba gukina n’iya Portugal kuwa 26 Kanama 2014, Nana Kwaku Bonsam akaba avuga ko yamaze gusaba Iman aze gukora kuri Cristiano ngo atazahaboneka.
Aganira na radio Angel FM yagize ati : « Nta mikino mfite, mu cyumweru gishize nagiye gushaka imbwa 4 kugirango nkore imvange idasanzwe yitwa ‘Kahwiri Kapam’ , icyo Cristiano arwaye ndakizi kuko arijye ubiri inyuma »
Yongeyeho ati : Nabibabwiye mbere ho amezi 4 ko ndi gukora kuri Cristiano nta mikino kugirango atazaboneka mu gikombe cy’Isi cyangwa nibura ku mukino wa Ghana. Iki gikomere cye ntigishobora kuvurwa n’abaganga ba kizungu, ni abaganga b’imyuka bakivura. Uyu munsi ni mu ivi, ejo ni mu itako, ejobundi ikindi kintu.
Source: africatopsports.com

Mugihe Leta y’u Rwanda ikangurira Abanyarwanda kubana mu mahoro n’ubumwe ,abo mu karere ka Kirehe bo wagirengo ntibibareba.Ibi birashingirwa ku bikorwa by’urugomo itsinda ry’abagore bo mu karere ka Kirehe bakoreye Muteteri Claudine bakamukubitira imbere y’umuyobozi w’umudugudu wa Rebero Bukuru vestine ari kumwe n’umugabo we Ndayisaba Innocent.Uru rugomo rw’urukozasoni rwakorewe uyu mucikacu mugihe u Rwanda n’isi yose bari mu minsi ijana hibukwa jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ku nshuro 29.
Umuryango 
... 
si.
Uwakubiswe agahohoterwa agapfurwa umusatsi ariwe Muteteri Claudine atuye mu mudugudu wa Rebero, Akagali ka Muganza,abakubise aribo
Sandirine munezero niwe wakubise anapfura umusatsi avugako umugabo babyaranye asigaye abana na Muteteri Claudine.Uyu sandirine munezero atuye umudugudu wa Nyarurenbo ,Akagali ka nyabigega umurenge wa Kirehe.
Uwimpundu Janviere atuye umudugudu wa Rebero, Akagali ka Muganza , Umurenge wa Gatore yahuruje bashiki buwo babyaranye bahohitera Muteteri Claudine kugeza n’
...
azwe icyabateye kwibasira umuturage.Mubihe bitandukanye hagenda humvikana impfu zitunguranye zabishwe,rimwe na rimwe ntihamenyekane abicanyi,niyo bamenyekanye bagatoroka.Abarokotse jenoside yakorewe abatutsi mu karere ka Kirehe twaganiriye bakangako twatangaza amazina yabo kubera umutekano wabo, tuganira badutangarijeko basabako itsinda riyibowe na Sandirine Munezero ryakurikiranwa mu butabera cyane ko bakoze icyaha gikabije kuko bagikoze mu cyunamo .Uwo bireba niwe uhanzwe amaso.
Kimenyi claude

Umukinnyi ukomeye wa Fc Barcelona, umunya Brasil ukomejwe kuvugwaho gushaka ku muri iyi kipe Neymar Jr Dos Santos, ukomeje kugaragariza isi ko atakibona mu ikipe ya Barca kurubu noneho atanze ikimenyetso simusiga kitigeze kimurangwaho kuva yagera muri iyi kipe aho yifashe akarwana n’umukinnyi mushya muri iyi kipe Nelson Semedo. Muri iyi nkuru tukaba twabashyiriyemo iyo video igaragaza uko gushwana kubaye hagati ya Neymar na Semedo mu myitozo ikipe ya Fc Barcelona iri gukorera ku butaka bwa Leta Zunze ubumwe Z’Amerika.

Banyarwanda banyarwandakazi batuye muri Canada ndetse nahandi hose. mbandikiye iyi nyandiko ndimo gutabariza urubyiruko nyarwanda ndetse no kurugira inama, cyane cyane urutuye hano muri Canada no muturere dutandukanye. Urwo rubyiruko rukaba rukomeje gushorwa mubikorwa byo kugirira nabi bagenzi barwo, ndeste no kubigisha inzangano zizadusubiza mu bikorwa byoretse u Rwanda, tutibagiwe no guhemukira u Rwanda rwejo hazaza. Muri ibyo bikorwa urubyiruko rutozwa, harimo kugirira nabi abatavuga rumwe na
... 
a kubera iperereza rigikomeza.
Ikibabaje muri byose nuko uru rubyiruko rukora ibi bikorwa ruba rwarinjiye muri Canada gusaba ubuhungiro ruvuga ko ruje ruhunga ubwicanyi bwa Paul Kagame na leta ye. Rukaba runashyira cyane cyane mumajwi Jacky Nziza ndetse na Danny Munyuza, hanyuma Eric umukozi wa Ambassade y’u Rwanda, akarukoresha mu bikorwa byo “kuroga” ndetse no gutoteza bagenzi barwo b‘abanyarwanda ruba rwasanze hano muri Canada. Abandi bashyirwa kw’isonga mu gukorana na Eric ni abahoze ari aba
...
da, kwicwa nabanyamerica bazungu, n’ukurogwa,n’ukuraswa, n’ugukurwamo amagufa, impfiko,nibindi vyose, abana babakobwa babanyarwanda babakuramo Uterus, ovary, nibindi bice byose byabakobwa, bicwa nabi cyane buri munsi birenze agahinda. ayo niyo makuru yurupfu rwabana babanyarwanda bicwa buri munsi muri America USA. abo bana bose babazanaga babavana muri africa babita ko arimpunzi ko babahaye ubuhungiro muri america hanyuma reba uru rupfu babica abo bana.
Banyarwanda mwese ni mutabare abana banyu.

Umukuru w’igihugu ca Tanzaniya John Pombe Magufuli, yahagaritse mu kazi umuyobozi mukuru w’ikigo c’igihugu kijejwe akaranga (NIDA), aca asaba ko hatangura gukorwa amatohoza.
Umunyamabanga mukuru wa Reta ya Tanzaniya, Ombeni Sefue, avuga ko Dickson Maimu yahagaritswe mu bikorwa vyiwe mu ntumbero umukuru w’igihugu yihaye yo gutuza igiturire.
Yavuze ko amakuru umukuru w’igihugu afise yerekana ko ikigo kijejwe akaranga NIDA cakoresheje amamiriyaridi 179.6 z’amashilingi. Ayo nayo kubwo umukuru w’igihugu John Magufuli ararenze,arico gituma yasavye ko haba amatohoza kuco ayo mafaranga yakoze.
Ombeni avuga kandi ko umukuru w’igihugu Magufuli yakiriye ibibazo vy’abanyagihugu bavuga ko bakirwa nabi iyo bituye ico kigo aho babasaba no gutanga karangamuntu zabo. binubira serivisi mbi mu gutanga ibyangombwa birimo n’indangamuntu, nk’uko BBC ikomeza ibitangaza.
Umugambi w’umukuru w’igihugu ca Tanzaniya wo kurwanya igiturire umaze gukora ku bategetsi batari bake harimwo n’umukuru w’ikivuko ca Dar-Es-Salaam.
Igiturire.ntiki.zig era.gihera.muri.tanzania

Umutoza w’ikipe ya APR FC, Rubona Emmanuel yahishuye ibanga ryamufashije gutsinda umukino wa mbere muri iyi kipe, ubwo bahuraga na Bugesera FC mu mukino wa shampiyona y’u Rwanda ku munsi wa kane.
APR FC yatsinze Bugesera FC ibitego 2-0, mu mukino wabereye ku Kicukiro, ibitego byatsinzwe na Rwatubyaye Abdoul na Issa Bigirimana mu gice cya kabiri. Muri uyu mukino igice cya mbere cyarangiye ari ubusa ku busa, umutoza wa APR FC atangaza ko ubwo bari mu karuhuko, yabwiye abakinnyi be kwigirira ikizer
... 
gukana igikombe cya shampiyona inshuro 15, nyuma yo gutsindwa na Mukura VS ibitego 2-0, akanganya na Police FC igitego 1-1 kuva asimbuye abari abatoza ba APR FC, yatangaje ko kuri ubu bigenda biza gahoro gahoro ariko ngo icyangombwa ni uko abakinnyi bigirira icyizere. Ku bafana b’iyi kipe baba bashidikanye ku bushobozi bw’uyu mutoza, Rubona Emmanuel yagize ati:’
“Bazabona ibikorwa, ibikorwa byonyine ni byo bizavuga.” Nyuma y’ibyumweru bibiri amaze muri APR FC, Rubona Emmanuel akaba atangaza ko a
...
e abakinnyi 30 kandi bose bashoboye aakaba ari yo mpamvu akinisha bamwe abandi
akabaruhutsa. Rubona Emmanuel yagizwe umutoza mukuru wa APR FC nyuma yaho Dusan Dule avuye muri iyi kipe, naho Mashami Vincent wariumutoza wungirije agabwa akazi gahoraho mu ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi.
Shampiyona y’u Rwanda mu kiciro cya mbere izakomeza ku munsi wa gatanu mu byumweru bibiri bii imbere, nyuma y’umwiherero ikipe y’igihugu Amavubi igomba gukorera mu gihugu cya Maroc

Ikipe ya Rayon Sports yaguye miswi na Al-Hilal Benghazi igitego 1-1 mu mukino ubanza w'ijonjora rya kabiri wabaye kuri iki Cyumweru kuri Kigali Pelé Stadium.
Ni umukino wabanjirijwe n'impaka haba mbere yawo iminsi mike ndetse na mbere y'uko umukino nyirizina utangira.
Ni nyuma y'aho ikipe ya Al-Hilal Benghazi yasabye Ishyirahamwe ry'Umupira w'Amaguru muri Afurika CAF kwakira uyu mukino nta mufana n'umwe uri muri Stade. Ni ibintu bitashimishije abakunzi ba Rayon Sports basanzwe bayishyigikira mu 
... 
nyuma y'ibiza bikomeye byibasiye igihugu cya Libya byahitanye benshi.
Mbere y'uko uyu mukino utangira akndi ikipe ya Al-Hilal Benghazi yasabye ko habanza gusohorwa bamwe mu bari bari muri stade yavugaga ko bari benshi ugereranyije n'abo bemeranyijwe mu masezerano.
Mu mukino nyirirzina Rayon Sports yahushije uburyo butandukanye bw'amahirwe bwo kubona igitego haba mu gice cya mbere n'icya kabiri. Igice cya mbere cy'umukino cyarangiye nta kipe ibashije kureba mu izamu ry'indi.
Igice cya kabiri Rayo
...
ona igitego cyo gufungura amazamu cyatsinze na Héritier Luvumbu kuri penaliti kiza kwishyurwa ku munota wa 84 w'umukino.
Umukino wo kwishyura nawo uzabera kuri Kigali Pelé Stadium kuwa Gatandatu tariki 30 Nzeri 2023 wo ukazaba wakiriwe na Rayon Sports.
Ikipe izakomeza izahita ibona itike yo gukina mu matsinda y'igikome cya CAF Confederation Cup.
Rayon Sports iheruka mu matsinda mu mwaka wa 2018 ikaba yaranageze muri kimwe cya kane cy'irangiza muri iki gikombe.
Photos: Rayon Sports FC
Rigoga Ruth

Ibiro by’Umushinjacyaha Mukuru w’Urwego Mpuzamahanga Rwashiriweho Gukora Imirimo y’Insigarira y’Inkiko Mpanabyaha (IRMCT) uyu munsi biremeza urupfu rwa Augustin Bizimana, umwe mu bashakishwaga n’ubutabera mpuzamahanga akaba anaregwa kuba yari umuyobozi mukuru mugihe cya jenoside yakorewe Abatutsi mu Rwanda muri 1994. Uku kwemeza uru rupfu gushingiye ku bumenyi bw’irangamiterere bwimbitse bwakozwe ku bisigazwa by’umubiri we ku mva iri iPointe Noire muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo.
N
... 
e ibikorwa by’ingenzi, kandi bikaba bayararanzwe n’ubufatanyabikorwa bw’intangarugero bw’inzego z’uRwanda, Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo, Ubuholand na Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika. Mu mpera z’umwaka ushize, ibiro by’Umushinjacyaha Mukuru byakoze isesengura ry’ibisigazwa by’umurambo byari byarabonetse kera muri Pointe Noire muri Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo hakoreshejwe ikoranabuhanga rya DNA. Ipererza ryakurikiyeho mu mezi ashize ya vuba hamwe n’igereranywa rya DNA ryagara
...
ihugu cy’uRwanda, ibiro by’Umushinjacyaha Mukuru bikaba bikomeje kumukurikirana. Ibiro by’Umushinjacyaha kandi birimo gukurikirana cyane abandi batanu bashakishwa bakaba baranashiriweho impapuro zibafata n’urukiko rwa TPIR/ICTR aribo Fulgence Kayishema, Phénéas Munyarugarama, Aloys Ndimbati, Ryandikayo na Charles Sikubwabo.
Ibiro by’Umushinjacyaha Mukuru birahamagarira ibihugu byose bigize Umuryango w’Abibumbye kongera ingufu mu bufatanye hagamijwe gushyikiriza ubutabera abasigaye bagishakishwa.

Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba (EAC), watangaje ko wasubitse Inama ya 21 y’Abakuru b’Ibihugu na za Guverinoma bigize uwo muryango yagombaga kubera Arusha muri Tanzania muri uku kwezi.
EAC yatangaje ko iyo nama yasubitswe kubera icyorezo cya Coronavirus gikomeje kwibasira ibihugu bitandukanye ku Isi.
Mu itangazo ryanyujijwe kuri Twitter uwo muryango wagize uti “Kubera gukwirakwira kwihuse kw’icyorezo cya Novel Coronavirus, Umuryango wa Afurika y’Iburasirazuba wasubitse inama ya 21 kugeza ik
... 
muri EAC kimaze gutangaza ko habonetse umuntu wa mbere urwaye Coronavirus. Ibindi bihugu bigize uwo muryango nabyo byafashe ingamba zikomeye z’ubwirinzi zirimo guhagarika ibikorwa bihuriza hamwe abantu benshi.
Iyi nama yasubitswe ku nshuro ya gatatu nyuma y’uko yagombaga kuba ku wa 30 Ugushyingo 2019 ntibikunde kuko hari igihugu cyari cyamenyesheje ko kitaboneka.
Inama yimuriwe tariki 29 Gashyantare 2020 ariko nabwo ntiyaba kuko umubare w’abagombaga kuyitabira utari ushyitse. Yahise yimurirwa ik
...
’Epfo ndetse banemeze ibyavuye mu isuzuma ku kwemeza Somalia nk’umunyamuryango wa EAC.
Kwemerera Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Congo (RDC), kwinjira muri EAC ni indi ngingo yagombaga kuganirwaho nyuma y’uko iki gihugu gitanze ubusabe muri Kamena umwaka ushize.
RDC yasabye kwinjira muri uyu muryango ku wa 8 Kamena 2019, mu ibaruwa yandikiye umuyobozi wa EAC, Perezida Kagame. Ivuga ko impamvu yasabye kuwinjiramo ari ukwiyongera kw’amasezerano y’ubucuruzi igirana n’ibihugu bigize uyu muryango.

Imitwe yitwaje intwaro irimo uw’iterabwoba wa FDLR, ikomeje gukora ibikorwa bihonyora uburenganzira bw’Abanyekongo bavuga Ikinyarwanda bo mu bwoko bw’Abatutsi, birimo...
Umuryango w’Abibumbye na Guverinoma ya Repubulika Iharanira Demokarasi ya congo, bashyize umukono ku masezerano yo gutangira kuvana ingabo za MONUSCO...

Ababyeyi, abarezi barasabwa gufasha abana b’abakobwa guhabwa urukingo rwa kanseri y’inkondo y’umura bakanarwanya ibihuha biruvugwaho.
Ibi ni ibyasabwe na Kanyankore William, umuyobozi w’ibitaro bikuru bya Gisenyi ubwo hatangwaga urukingo rwa kanseri y’inkondo y’umura ku bana 70 biga mu kigo cy’amashuri yisumbuye Lycée Notre Dame de Nyundo.
Uru rukingo kandi rukaba rwahawe abandi bana 4373 biga mu mwaka wa gatandatu w’amashuri abanza bafite hagati y’imyaka 12 na 14.
Kanyankore akaba yasobanuye ko ubushakashatsi bwerekanye ko abantu 490,000 bahitanwa n’iyi kanseri ku isi abandi 270,000 bakaba bashobora kuyirwara. Iyo mibare ngo ikaba ariyo yateye Leta y’u Rwanda gukingira abana b’abakobwa ku buntu kugirango batahura na yo.
Indi mpamvu ngo ni uko kanseri y’inkondo y’umura iyo itinze kwivuzwa ifata ibindi bice by’umubiri nk’umwijima, ibihaha, amagufa ndetse n’ubwonko. Yagize ati « kenshi mu Rwanda abayirwaye bagera kwa muganga batakibashije kuvurwa. »
Abana b’abakobwa bakaba babanje gusobanuza iby’urukingo kugirango bamarwe impungenge n’ibihuha bagenda bumva hirya no hino.
Umulisa Brigitte, ushinzwe w’ubuzima mu karere ka Rubavu akaba yabamaze impungenge kuko Leta nta kintu kibi izanira abaturage, ati « ibihuha bigomba gucika kuri uru rukingo ahubwo utabyumva neza agasobanuza ».
Uru rukingo akaba ari inshuro ya mbere rutanzwe muri uyu mwaka. Uwaruhawe aruhabwa inshuro eshatu.

Mu murwa mukuru wa Leta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika, I Washington, DC, abapolisi babiri bashinzwe umutekano ku ngoro inteko ishinga amategeko ikoreramo bakomeretse kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki 02 Mata 2021. Ibyo byabaye ubwo umuntu yatwaye imodoka ayikubita ku bidandi bya sima bigize bariyeri yo gukumira imodoka ziza kuri iyo nyubako. Umwe muri abo bapolisi yaje kwitaba Imana aguye mu bitaro.
Amakuru atangwa na Police irinda iyo ngoro ya Capitol avuga ko ukekwa yavuye muri iyo modoka afite intwaro, arik
... 
Abashinzwe umutekano babwiye ibiro ntaramakauuru Associated Press by’Abanyamerika ko uwo ukekwa yari yakomeretse cyane, ku buryo na we yaje gupfa ari mu bitaro. Ibiro bya FBI I Washington byitabajwe biza gutera inkunga ku ngoro ya Capitol.
Iyi nyubako imaze iminsi ikikijwe n’inzitiro zifasha mu kwita ku mutekano wayo kuva ibitero by’abashyigikiye uwahoze ari Perezida Donald Trump bikozwe tariki ya 6 y’ukwezi kwa mbere 2021. Icyo gihe bageragezaga kubuza abadepite n‘abasenateri kubarura no kwemez
...
anzwe na koleji y’itora yemeje Joe Biden nka perezida w’Amerika.
Uruzintiro ry’inyuma nkuko VOA ibitangaza, rwakuweho muri iki cyumweru dusoza, n’ubwo hari urundi ruzitiro rw’imbere rukiriho rutuma umuntu atakwinjira aho iyo ngoro yubatse uko yishakiye. Ubu hari abasirikari ba za reta batageze ku bihumbi 2,200 bafasha abapolisi kwita ku mutekano w’iyo ngoro kuva yagabwaho ibitero. Muri iki gihe abenshi mu badepite n’abasenateri bari mu kiruhuko muri za reta zabo.

Nubwo umukino wa Basketball ugenda utera imbere mu Rwanda, abahanzi bakomeye ntibakunze kuririmba indirimbo ziwurata nk’uko byagiye bigenda ku baraperi bakomeye muri Amerika ariyo mpamvu MAC Classic yabimburiye abandi gukora indirimbo isingiza uyu mukino.
Aganira n’itangazamakuru, MAC Classic yavuze ko kuba Abanyarwanda bari gutera imbere mu mukino wa Basketball n’abafana bakaza ku bibuga ku bwinshi ariyo mpamvu yahisemo gukora iyi ndirimbo ya mbere ivuga kuri uyu mukino mu Rwanda.
Yagize ati “Iyi ndirimbo nayikoze ngamije gushyigikira umukino wa Basketball mu Rwanda no gutera ingabo mu bitugu abakinnyi b’Abanyarwanda bamaze gutera intambwe ishimishije.’’
MAC Classic yavuze ko kuba abaye umuhanzi wa mbere mu Rwanda no ku Isi uririmbye indirimbo isingiza Basketball y’u Rwanda ari ishema kuri we ndetse ngo yishimiye ko yatanze umusanzu we nk’umuhanzi mu gushyigikira Basketball y’u Rwanda.
Agashya kagaragaye mu mashusho y’indirimbo ya mbere isingiza Basketball y’u Rwanda ni itsinda ry’ababyinnyi bakundwa na benshi ku mikino itandukanye ya Basketball bazwi nka African Cheer Leaders n’abandi ba Urban Dance Crew.
Iyi ndirimbo yagaragayemo kandi abakinnyi bakomeye muri Basketball y’u Rwanda barimo Shyaka Olivier na Nshobozwabyosenumukiza Wilson bakinira REG BBC n’Ikipe y’Igihugu.
Umuhanzi MAC Classic yakoze izindi ndirimbo zirimo nka "Turn up" na "Slay Queen".
TANGA IGITEKEREZO

Umuryango w’abibumbye, ONU, wumvikanishije imyuzure yasize abantu amagana iheruheru muri Somaliya no mu bihugu bituranyi mu burasirazuba bw’Afurika, nk’ikintu kiba rimwe mu myaka ijana.
Aha kandi ni nyuma y’amapfa yinjiye mu mateka y’ako karere. Abantu babarirwa muri miliyoni 1.6 muri Somaliya bashobora guhura n’ingaruka z’imvura nyinshi, yakajijwe na serwakira zo mu nyanja y’Ubuhinde.
Umuhuzabikorwa wa OCHA, ishami rishinzwe ubutabazi rya ONU, yabivuze mw’itangazo mw’ijoro ry’ejo kuwa kane. Imyuzure yabaye nyuma y’imvura nyinshi yatangiranye n’ukwezi kwa cumi, yamaze guhitana abantu batari munsi ya 29 kandi yakuye mu byabo abarenga 300.000 muri Somaliya no mu mijyi yarengewe n’amazi hamwe n’imidugudu mu mpande zose za Kenya.
Inkambi z’abateshejwe ibyabo n’inyeshyamba za kiyisilamu n’amapfa akaze mu myaka 40, nazo zahuye imyuzure, bituma abantu bongera guhunga, nk’uko imiryango itanga infashanyo ibivuga.
Umubare munini w’abataye ibyabo, wongereye ibikenewe mu rwego rw’ubutabazi kandi n’amazu ashobora gukomeza gusenyuka. OCHA yabivuze, isanga miliyoni 1.5 za hegitari z’ubutaka bwashoboraga guhingwa zarangiritse.
Martin Griffiths, wungirije umunyamabanga mukuru wa ONU ushinzwe guhuza ibikorwa by’ubutabazi n’iby’ingoboka mu bihe by’ibiza, yagize ati: “Tuzi ibyabo byugarije kandi tugomba gutanguranwa tukitegura mbere y’igihe”. (Reuters)

URUGO RWANJE NI FILM NSHASHA YANDITSWE YA PATRICK AMEDE.
1.
URUGO RWANJE ni Film nshasha yanditswe na KANYAMUNEZA PATRICK AMEDE.
Nkuko bimenyeshwa n'umuhagarikizi w'iryo reresi ngo ni Film ivuga ku nkuru y'umugabo yakoze ubugeni atagira akazi. Uyo mugabo n'umugore baciye mu bibazo bitari bike, ariko bagumye bakundana.
Umugore ahembwe yashikiriza umushahara wose umugabo havuyemwo ikigiracumi conyene.
Igihe kimwe vyose birahinduka, umugabo nawe araronka akazi
Inyuma y'igihe akazi yaronse karamurungitse gukorera mu mahanga
Umugore harageze igihe yriko arondera muma dossiers y'umugabo asanga impapuro zose yaguriyeko ibintu, nka terefone, imodoka, urupango n'inzu vyose yabiguze kw'izina ry'umugore
Mu nyuma abona agakete yasize amwandikiye ati: "Umugore wanje ni vyose kuri jewe, n'ibi bintu naguze ntanakimwe kinganya valeur n'urukundo ndamukunda"
Kuko vyose nabironse kubwiwe
Film yaraheze gukorwa.
Uyo yahagarikiye ireresi URUGO RWANJE abandanya avuga ko igikorwa co Kuyishira ku mugaragaro kizoba, ariko kandi ngo babanje gukora synopsis yayo ibanze imenyekanishe igikorwa kiriko kiraza vuba
Muri kino gihe bariko baravugana n'umu bailleur yemeye kudufasha icerekeye lancement officiel vuba cane inyishu izotangwa vuba.
PATRICK AMEDE ahamagarira abakunzi ba film n'uko bofata mu mugongo abakinyi bazo haba mu buryo, mu kubaterera ivyiyumviro n'ibindi kugira ngo bashobore gukomeza igikorwa co gukina film kuko si igikorwa coroshe.

Abantu bashika cumi baramaze gupfa ku munsi ugira kabiri w'imirwano mu muji wa Kismayo uri mu bumanuko bwa Somalia.
Uwo muji usanzwe ufatiye runini Somalia mu butunzi.
Abahatuye babariye BBC ko imirwano ikomeye cane, kandi abantu benshi bariko barahunga.
Abasirikare b'umuryango w'ubumwe bwa Afrika bariko baragerageza kwumvikanisha imigwi ibiri y'abarwanyi iriko iratana mu mitwe.
Iyo migwi itegekwa n'abantu babiri bose bigize abakuru b'ibihugu muri ako karere kazwi kw'izina rya Jubaland.
Umukuru w'igihugu wa Somalia, Hassan Sheikh Mohamud, yavuze ko imirwano iri i Kismayo ibangamiye intambwe umutekano wari ugezeko mu mezi aheze.

Bwana Ngarambe Yohani Batisita uhagarariye ishyaka PDR-Ihumure aratuganiriza ku bijyana n’imyigaragambo yabereye i Buruseli kuri 11/02/2015, yari igenewe gutabariza impunzi z’abanyarwanda zi

Dore ikiganiro cyatambutse mu gihe cyage
...
 akanyuza ikiganiro kirambuye kuri Radio Ijwi Rya Rubanda, hari abanyarwanda berekanye umutima n’ubushake bwo kurwana kuri izo mpunzi. Bahereyeko rero biyemeza gutangira umushinga wo gufasha uko babishoboye izo nzirakarengane zibagiranwe iyi myaka yose. Uwo mushinga niwo bise HOPE-IKIZERE, ufite urubuga rwitwa http://hope-ikizere.org.
Venanti rero aratugezaho iby’urugendo rwe, noneho we na bagenzi be bahuriye ku mushinga HOPE-IKIZERE bafate umwanya wo gusubiza ibibazo by’abakurikirana ikiganiro.

Undi mukinnyi w’ikipe ya APR FC Habyarimana Innocent yatangiye imyitozo mu ikipe ya Rayon Sports aho yitegura gusinya amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri akinira iyi kipe yegukanye shampiyona y’umwaka ushize.
Habyarimana Innocent, agiye guca agahigo ko gukinira amakipe atatu akomeye mu myaka itatu yikurikirana, dore ko APR FC yamukuye muri Police FC mu mwaka wa shampiyona wabanjirije uwo twashoje, none akaba agiye kuyisohokamo atanasoje amasezerano.
Di Maria nkuko bamwita, yari yasinye imyaka ibiri ahabwa na miliyoni umunani ngo aze asimbure Iranzi Jean Claude muri APR FC, gusa uyu wahoze ari kapiteni wa Police ntiyagira kinini agaragaza muri iyi kipe y’ingabo z’igihugu.
Ruhagoyacu, yanditse iyi nkuru ivuga ko amakuru avuga ko APR FC yari ifite gahunda yo kumuha andi mahirwe yo kuba yakwigaragaza mu mwaka utaha wa shampiyona, gusa uyu musore yaje kwisabira ubwe ko ikipe yamureka akigendera, ni ko guhabwa release letter imusohora muri iyi kipe ibarizwa ku Kimihurura.
Uyu musore wari waravuganye na Rayon Sports, kuri uyu munsi tariki 3 Kanama ni bwo yatangiye imyitozo ku mugaragaro mu mwambaro w’iyi kipe y’ubururu n’umweru, asangamo Usengimana Faustin na Mwiseneza Djamar bakinanaga muri APR FC.
Amakuru akaba avuga ko ari buze guhabwa amasezerano y’imyaka ibiri aherekejwe na miliyoni eshatu z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.

Mu musi iheze hari amakuru yagumye akwirakwizwa hirya no hino ko umuririmvyi Bruce Melodie yoba agiye kugura imodoka yo mu bwoko bwa Brabus, ariko arabihakana kuko ngo ata hantu na hamwe arigera abishikiriza.
Amakuru mashasha yabonetse ngo nuko iyo modoka yahakanywe n’uwo muririmvyi amaze imisi I Dubai ngo yamaze gushika I Kigali, aho bariko baraheraheza bimwe mu bikorwa noneho abone kuyishikirizwa.
Iyo modoka iri mu bwoko bwa Brabus G Class, ariko ntiharamenyekana vyukuri igihe yakorewe n’ibindi vyinshi kuriyo, ariko ikizwi co nuko iri mu zizimvye kuko mu mafaranga ya hano iwacu ifise agaciro karenga gato Imiliyoni 600, nkuko Igihe yabishikirije.
Bruce Melodie azoba abaye umuririmvyi wa mbere mu Rwanda agira mu modoka izimvye, aho ni mu gihe amaze igihe ariko aravugwako kutavuga rumwe n’abamwitangiye mu muziki, ariko navyo akabitera ivyatsi.

Ubushinjacyaha bwarekuye by’agateganyo abanyamakuru Byansi na Nshimyumukiza
Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha(RIB) ruvuga ko aba banyamakuru bombi bakurikiranyweho icyaha cyo kwigomeka ku buyobozi banga kubahiriza amabwiriza yo kwirinda no gukumira ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19 no guhohotera abashinzwe kuyubahiriza.
Umuvugizi w’Ubushinjacyaha, Faustin Nkusi, yabwiye Kigali Today dukesha aya makuru ko aba banyamakuru barekuwe by’agateganyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki 02 Nyakanga 2020 bazajya bitaba Ubushinjacyaha bari hanze.
Yagize ati "Bazakomeza gukurikiranwa bari hanze, bazajya bitaba buri wa Gatanu wa buri cyumweru, mbere yo gufata umwanzuro wa nyuma".
Byansi Samuel Baker na Nshimyumukiza Janvier bari bamaze icyumweru bakorwaho iperereza, bakaba bari bafungiwe muri kasho kuri sitasiyo ya RIB ya Kicukiro.

Kylian Mbappé yamenyesheje PSG ko azagenda mu mpeshyi
Kylian Mbappé yabwiye Perezida wa Paris Saint-Germain, Nasser Al-Khelaïfi, ko yifuza kuyisohokamo mu mpera z’umwaka w’imikino wa 2023-2024 ubwo amasezerano ye azaba arangiye.
Ibi byatangajwe n’Ikinyamakuru gikomeye cyo mu Bufaransa, Le Parisien, kuri uyu wa Kane, tariki ya 15 Gashyantare 2024, kivuga ko Perezida wa PSG yamaze kumenyeshwa n’uyu mukinnyi ko ari hafi kugenda.
Ni nyuma y’uko yemeranyije n’ubuyobozi ko atazongera amasezerano yari afitanye na yo kuko azarangira tariki ya 30 Kamena 2024, agahita agendera ubuntu.
Iki kinyamakuru kuvuga ko Nasser Al-Khelaïfi akimara kumenya umwanzuro wafashwe n’uyu mukinnyi yahise ahamagara Umutoza Mukuru, Luis Enrique, ndetse n’Umuyobozi wa Siporo, Luis Campos, abamenyesha impinduka.
Ntagihindutse Real Madrid yo muri Espagne ni yo izegukana uyu rutahizamu w’imyaka 25 dore yatangiye kuvugana n’abahagarariye uyu mukinnyi.

Ku munsi w’ejo kuwa gatandatu, umunsi wari utegerejwe na benshi mu muryango, inshuti n’Abanyarwanda bose wari wageze, umukobwa umwe wa Perezida Paul Kagame yakoze ubukwe, yashyingiranywe na Bertrand Ndengeyingoma.
Ku munsi w’ejo benshi mukaba mwarabashije kureba video ya Ange Kagame na Bertrand Ndengeyingoma barimo binjira muri convention center aho bari bagiye gusangira n’abantu batandukanye bari bitabiriye ubukwe bwabo.
Yegob.rw ikaba yabashije kubona amafoto y’ahantu reception y’ubu bukwe, tukaba tugiye kuyabagezaho ngo namwe mwihere ijisho.

Umuririmvyi w’umurundi azira igishegu ngo ni Ir Emery Sun, ivyo ni ibiheruka gushikirizwa n’umuririmvyi akaba kandi n’umuhinyanyuzi Pacifique Nzitonda benshi bazi nka Paci Etoile du Centre.
Mu majambo yasangije abakurikirana urubuga rwiwe rwa Facebook, uwo mugabo ari gupagasa i Burayi avuga ko indirimbo Indyarya ya Emery Sun yamusubijemwo icizere ko abanditsi b’indirimbo nziza bakihari hano iwacu.
Yanditse ati : “Hari indirimbo wumva ugaca ugira icizere kuko abandika neza kandi n’umudiho uryoshe baracariho! ”
Uwo muririmvyi ntiyatamvye yirorera kuko abashigikiye iciyumviro ko umuntu yarambiwe n’umuziki w’ibishegu, indirimbo yo kwumviriza ari Indyarya bagumye bamwitsa mu ma “Commentaires” aho abatari bake barimwo abamenyeshamakuru batandukanye nka Styves Derrick bateye intege uwo muririmvyi.
Mu kiganiro aheruka gutanga, Ir Emery Sun yari yamenyesheje ko ata mugambi wo guhindura umudiho agira, ariko kandi ngo nta mugambi afise wo gukora indirimbo zitagira amajambo yigisha.
Mwomenya ko uwo muririmvyi yanamenyesheje ko uno mwaka yiteguye bikwiye kugira asohore indirimbo zitari nke, abari bishwe n’umwumwa abahaze.

Emery sun ngo yoba yarahembwe amafaranga y’igiteramo Kandi ataririmvye, ivyo n’ibiheruka gushikirizwa na Queen Of Buzz Ariwe Nelly Nat, aho yashikiriza ko habayemwo ubusuma mw’itegurwa n’urutonde rw’abahemberwa ico giteramo.
Nkuko amakuru ashikirizwa na Nelly yabivuga ngo Emery ntiyabashije kubonake muri ico giteramo, kuko batari bumvikanye n’uwariko atagura ico giteramo ku bijanye n’ivyo Emery sun asaba ngo abashe kuboneka muri ico giteramo.
Naho batari bumvikanye, amakuru Nelly yatanze avuga ko ngo uwarajejwe gutanga urutonde rw’abahembwa, yashizemwo Emery sun mu bahembwa, ariko Numero ya Compte yo gushirwako amafaranga ikaba atari iya Emery Sun.
Abaririmvyi bagenzi we bamaze kubona Urwo rutonde, ngo boba baciye barya urwara Emery Sun, nawe abona guhinduza Numero Compte yari yanditswe kuri urwo rupapuro. Haciye umwanya nk’uwo gukubita urugohe Compte ngo iba ikorokeyeko umuliyoni w’amafaranga ya hano iwacu.
Naho Emery yahembwe atakoze, ayo makuru Nelly atanga akaba avuga ko ngo yaciye atangura kuronderwa n’uwari kuyashira ku w’inyuma kw’izina rya Emery ngo asubize udufaranga twa bandi.
Iyi nkuru tukaba tuzobandanya tuyigarukako mu makuru yacu yo hanyuma, ariko ico twabashije kumenya co nuko Emery yemeza ko ivyashikirijwe na Nelly ari ukuri, vyabaye.

Perriello arasaba abarundi gushira imbere ibiganiro
Intumwa idasanzwe ya Amerika mu karere k'ibitaga binini, Thomas Perriello, uyu musi yarangije urugendo rw'imisi ibiri mu Burundi, aho yasavye impande zose gushira imbere ibiganiro.
Thomas Perriello, yarabonanye n'abaserukira reta, amashirahamwe ata ho yegamiye muri muri politike, abaserukira Onu hamwe n'ibihugu vyabo kugira bavugane ivyerekeye ibibazo vya politike n'umutekano bivugwa muri ico gihugu.
Iyo ntumwa yamenyesheje ko Amerika ishigikiye ibiganiro vyatanguye mu gihugu ca Tanzania bihuza abarundi bose bihagarikiwe n'uwahoze ari prezida wa Tanzania Benjamin Mkapa.
"Twemera ko ari yo nzira yonyene nziza kandi kandi irashe yo kugarukana amahoro no gutorera inyishu aya matati", uko ni ko Perriello yavuze mw'itangazo yashikirije arangije urugendo rwiwe.
Iyo ntumwa kandi icuga ko yabonanye n'umushikiranganji w'umutekano mu gihugu, Gen Alain Guillaume Bunyoni, baravugana ibibazo bijanye n'ibiganiro, ukudahana hamwe n'agateka ka zina muntu.
Ikindi bavuganye, ni inkurikizi z'umutekano muke kubutunzi bw'igihugu.
Yagarutse no ku kibazo c'abanyeshure bapfunzwe bazira kwonona ifoto y'umuru w'igihugu mu bitabo vy'ishure.
Thomas Perriello asaba impande zose kureka gukoresha inguvu bakitabira inzira y'ibiganiro.

Ikipe y’igihugu ya Basketball itangiye amarushanwa y’akarere ka 5 itsinda Kenya amanota 76 kuri 60.
Udece tune tugize umukino wa Basketball twarangiye abakinnyi barimo Kenny Gasana na Shyaka Olivier bafashije ikipe y’igihugu kwitwara neza.
Agace ka mbere u Rwanda rwagasoje ruyoboye n’amanota14 kuri 7 ya Kenya, agace ka kabiri ikipe ya Kenya yahindukiranye u Rwanda maze irakayobora karangira ari 32 ya Kenya kuri 26 y’u Rwanda.
U Rwanda rwagarutse mu gace ka gatatu rushakira intsinzi hasi no hejuru maze karangira ari 47 kuri 40 ya Kenya. Agace ka nyuma abasore b’u Rwanda nta kosa bagombaga gukora kuko baje kugasoza n’amanota 76 kuri 60 ya Kenya.
Kenny Gasana ukina muri Amerika niwe watsinze amanota menshi ku uruhande rw’u Rwanda yatsinze 22 mu gihe Shyaka Olivier wa Espoir yatsinze 13, Kami Kabange atsinda 9.
Uyu wari umukino wa kabiri mu itsinda rya kabiri, aho umukino ubanza Misiri yatsinze Sudani y’Epfo 87-76. Ku umunsi w’ejo kuwa Kabiri u Rwanda ruzakina na Misiri.
Twabibutsa ko amakipe abiri ya mbere muri iri rushanwa ariyo azabona tike yo gukina imikino y’igikombe cy’Afurika ’AfroBasket’ izabera muri Congo Brazaville mu kwezi kwa munani.

Ego, Ivyabona vya Yehova bama bafashije igihe hateye icago. Turafasha Ivyabona n’abatari Ivyabona bashikiwe n’ivyago, nk’uko Bibiliya ibidusaba mu Bagalatiya 6:10, ahagira hati: “Dukorere iciza bose, ariko canecane incuti zacu mu kwizera.” N’ikindi kandi, abashikiwe n’ivyago turagerageza kubafasha mu vy’Imana no kubaha indemesho baba bakeneye rwose muri ivyo bihe.—2 Abakorinto 1:3, 4.

WASHINGTON D.C. —
Inyuma y’umusi ugira kabiri abonana n’abanyapolitike hamwe n’abarongoye amashirahamwe atagira inyungu za politike, perezida w’igihugu ca Uganda, Yoweri Museveni yashoboye kubajijura kwicara hamwe .
Umuhanuzi mukuru wa perezida w’Uburundi, Willy Nyamitwe, avuga ko reta y’Uburundi ishima impanuro bwana Museveni yahaye abarundi, abasaba kuja mu biganiro.
Innocent Muhozi, arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe akarangamutima k’ugutangaza amakuru nawe nyene avuga kw’abegwa n’ibibazo vya politike mu Burundi bose bashimye impanuro za Yoweri Museveni.

Inyuma yo gutora urwandiko ruvuga ko Ubumwe bwa Buraya bwagize uruhara mu guterera mu vy’amahera ku bahungabanya Uburundi canke mu guhungabanya Uburundi, leta y’Uburundi yamenyesheje ko n’izindi nyandiko zerekana uruhara Ubumwe bwa Buraya bwagize mu guhungabanya Uburundi zibandanya zija ahabona.
Ku bwa Phillipe Nzobonariba, Umunyabanga akongera akaba n’Umuvugizi wa leta y’Uburundi, ni umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire n’ayandi makungu, Alain Aimé Nyamitwe yatanze iyo nkuru mu gihe hari Inama y’A
... 
nye ko inyandiko z’ibanga zerekana uruhara Ubumwe bwa Buraya mu guhungabanya Uburundi zibandanya zija ahabona uko imisi ibandanya igenda”, niko Phillipe Nzobonariba yavuze ku musi wa gatanu mu Nama Nshikiranganji yari irongowe n’Umukuru w’igihugu Pierre Nkurunziza, mwitangazo ryo kwiyamiriza Ubumwe bwa Buraya ku bikorwa vyo guhungabanya Uburundi.
Nyamitwe yarerekanye ivyavuye mu kiyago yakoranye n’Ubuserukizi bw’Ubumwe bwa Buraya Mu Burundi. Inama Nshikiranganji ikaba yaramenyeshejwe ko Ubumwe B
...
bumwe bwa Buraya akaba yamenyesheje ko ugutanga uburyo mu vy’amafaranga kwakorwa mu buryo bwo gushigikira ababuranira agateka ka zina muntu( Défenseurs des Droits de l’Homme).
Ukutabona ibintu kumwe hagati ya Leta y’uburundi n’Ubumwe Bwa Buraya Kuribonekeza cane, ariko izo mpande zose zibandanya zitanako amakosa, aho ni mugihe Ubumwe bwa Buraya bwanse ko ibihano bwafatiye Uburundi bitavanwaho, abanyagihugu b’Uburundi bakabandanya bahura n’ingaruka mbi zivyo bihano mu vy’Ubutunzi n’ibindi bisata.

Blaise Compaoré wigeze kuyobora Burkina Faso ashobora kugezwa imbere y'ubutabera kubera uruhare yaba yaragize mu rupfu rwa Thomas Sankara.
Urukiko rwa gisirikari muri iki gihugu ni rwo rwatangaje ko rugiye gutangiza iburanisha rya Compaore wahunze igihugu akuwe ku butegetsi n’imyigaragambyo y’abaturage bamusabaga kuva ku butegetsi. Ibi bibaye nyuma y’uko ubushinjacyaha bwemeje ibyaha Compaore n’abandi 13 ashinjanwa nabo bakurikiranyweho.
Compaore wamaze ku butegetsi imyaka 27 kuva mu 1987 nyuma y’urupfu rwa Sankara ashinjwa kugira uruhare mu kwica uwo yasimbuye ku butegetsi.
Uyu wahoze ayobora Burkina Faso, ubu akaba yarahungiye muri Cote d’Ivoire na bagenzi be bareganwa, barashinjwa ibyaha birimo guhungabanya umudendezo w’igihugu, ubufatanyacyaha mu bwicanyi no guhisha imibiri y’abambuwe ubuzima.
Thomas Sankara yafashe ubutegetsi mu 1983, ategeka Burkina Faso kugeza mu 1987 ubwo yicwaga afite imyaka 37.
Blaise Compaore yashyiriweho impapuro mpuzamahanga zo kumuta muri yombi mu 2016.

Abantu 42 nibo Polisi yasanze ku musozi basenga, bafashwe tariki ya 17 Nyakanga bafatirwa mu karere ka Gatsibo mu murenge wa Rugarama. Bakaba bari barenze ku mabwiriza ya Leta abuza abantu guteranira ahantu hamwe mu rwego rwo kwirinda ikwirakwira ry’icyorezo cya COVID-19.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu ntara y’Iburasirazuba, Chief Inspector of Police (CIP) Humdun Twizeyimana yavuze ko bariya bantu 42 bafatiwe ku musozi aho bari bateraniye bari mu masengesho . Bikaba byamenyekanye biturutse ku makuru yat
... 
urwanya Koronavirusi. Twahise dutegura igikorwa cyo kubafata, nibwo twabasanze bateraniye ahantu mu bisambu bari mu masengesho.”
Yakomeje avuga ko abo bantu aho bari bateraniye nta bwiriza na rimwe bari bubahirije, bari baturutse ahantu hatandukanye, nta wari wambaye agapfukamunwa, nta ntera yari hagati y’umuntu n’undi bose bari begeranye ndetse nta n’amazi yo gukaraba yari ahari yo gukaraba mu ntoki.
Umuvugizi wa Polisi mu ntara y’Iburasirazuba avuga ko ibyo byose byatuma banduzanya icyorezo cy
...
tse ahantu hatandukanye ntawe uzi aho mugenzi we yavuye n’uko ubuzima bwe buhagaze. Hariya bari bateraniye nta bwirinzi ubwo aribwo bwose bubahirije ku buryo umwe muri bo abaye yanduye yakwanduza abandi.”
CIP Twizeyimana yashimiye abaturage batanze amakuru ariko anakangurira n’abandi guhindura imyumvire bagakurikiza amabwiriza Leta itanga by’umwihariko muri ibi bihe byo kurwanya icyorezo cya COVID-19. Yibukije abantu ko uzajya arenga kuri ayo mabwiriza azajya afatwa ahanwe hakurikijwe amategeko.

Real Madrid yatsinze Bayern Munich ibitego 2-1
Real Madrid yatsinze umugwi wa Bayrn Munich ku kibuga cawo ca Alianz Arena mu gice ca kabiri gishira ica nyuma c'inkino z'igikombe c'imigwi yabaye iya mbere iwabo i Buraya.
Uwo mugwi usanganywe igikombe co mu mwaka uheze, uriko urita ku rutare kugira ugitware incuro ya gatatu wikurikiranya, vyagaragaye ko ucumbagira inyuma ariko ukaba ukomeye imbere.
Marcelo na Asensio ni bo binjije ibitego vy'uwo mugwi.
Umukinyi Joshua Kimmich ni we yatsindiye igitego umugwi wa Bayern.
Bayern yananiwe n'ibitego vyinshi, mu gihe igitego ca Christiano Ronaldo na co cahakanywe n'umuhagarikizi kubera yari yakoze umupira n'ukuboko.
Ubu rero Bayern bategerezwa gutsinda ibitego bibiri ku musi wa kabiri uza kugira babuze umugwi wa Real Madrid gushika mu gice ca nyuma incuro ya kane mu myaka itanu.

Mu ndwi turangije, igihugu ca Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika carafashe ingingo yo guhagarika gutanga impapuro z’inzira canke ama visas atuma Abarundi binjira muri Amerika.
Ariko rero leta y’Uburundi yahavuye iva mu gacerere maze iragira ico ivuze kuri iyo ngingo ya Amerika ku gihugu c’Uburundi.
Mu kiganiro umushikiranganji w’imigenderanire n’ayandi makungu yashikirije uyu musi wa mbere, Nibigira Ezechiel yavuze ko abo Barundi birukanywe bahari.
Ariko rero, Nibigira yamenysheje ibindi bintu bituma Amerika n’Uburundi bibandanya birabana ribi.
Nibigira yavuze ko mu banyagihugu Amerika yirukanye harimwo n’abatari abarundi.
Nibigira aca asaba nyabuna Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika ko yofata ingingo yo kurungika abo banyagihugu bamwe bamwe batari Abarundi mu bihugu vyabo.
Abihweza ibintu n’ibindi barabona ko Ndayishimiye Evariste ashobora kugiranira imiganderanire mibi na Amerika mugihe hobandanya ukutabona ibintu kumwe.
Mwomenya ko hari haciye imisi mike cane Leta Zunze Ubuwme za Amerika zimenyeheje ko ico gihugu citeguriye gukorana neza n’umukuru w’igihugu mushasha w’Uburundi ariwe Evariste Ndayishimiye.
Suite à cette décision, le Ministre @EzechielNib @MAEBurundi a fait savoir que parmi les ressortissants refoulés il y en a qui ne sont pas de nationalité burundaise. Et de demander au Gouvernement américain d'envoyer ces refoulés dans leurs pays d'origine et non au #Burundi.
— RTNB (@RTNBurundi) June 22, 2020

Mu ijoro ryo kuri iki Cyumweru abarwanyi ba Hezbollah barashe ibisasu bya Katyusha 320 muri Israel mu rwego rwo kwihorera ku gitero Israel iherutse kwiciramo uwari umuyobozi wa gisirikare wa Hezbollah witwaga Fuad Shakur.
Amakuru avuga ko muri ibyo bisasu byangije ahantu 11 mu birindiro by’ingabo za Israel.
Icyakora andi makuru avuga ko Israel yamenye amakuru y’uko ibyo bitero biri kuyitegurwaho bituma itangiza ibitero by’indege byo gukoma mu nkokora aba barwanyi n’imigambi yabo.
Hezbollah ivuga
... 
a imbaraga mu bitero byayo ku hantu hose Hezbollah igamije guhera irasa muri Israel.
Ibitero byayo bya mbere yabigabye mu Majyepfo ya Lebanon.
Ikigo ntaramakuru cya Lebanon kivuga ko ibitero Israel yaraye igabye ari byo bikomeye kuva intambara yo muri Gaza yatangira taliki 07, Ukwakira, 2023, hari ku wa Gatandatu.
Ni intambara igikomeje kandi biragoye ko hari uwakwemeza ko izarangira vuba aha.
Ibitero Israel yagabye kuri Lebanon kandi ngo byangije byinshi mu bikorwaremezo byayo.
Birimo imiyoboro
...
yura.
Mu gihe ibintu bimeze bityo ku ruhande rwa Israel na Lebanon, Amerika yatangaje ko iri gukurikiranira hafi uko byifashe.
Perezida Biden ngo ari gukurikiranira hafi uko ibintu byifashe.
Umunyamabanga wa Amerika ushinzwe ingabo witwa Lloyd J. Austin III avuga ko Amerika izafasha Israel mu byiza no mu bibi kandi ko umusanzu ku mutekano wayo uzakomeza gutangwa na Washington mu buryo budasubirwaho.
Amerika ivuga ko izakomeza kurinda Israel ngo idaterwa n’abanzi bayo barimo Iran n’abambari bayo.

Zimwe muri filime zo hanze y’imbibi z’u Rwanda, zizasohoka taliki ya 29 Mutarama 2021 ni izi zikurikira:
Ku wa gatanu taliki ya 29 Mutarama, 2021 hazajya hanze filime yitwa “The Night”. Ni filime yanditswe na Kourosh Ahari afatanyije na Milad Jarmooz ndetse aha ikaba iyobowe n’uyu Kourosh Ahari tubonye ko yanagize uruhare mu kuyandika.
Iyi filime iri gutunganyirizwa mu nzu zitunganya filime zirimo iyitwa SuperNova8 Films, 7Skies Entertainment, Mammoth Pictures, Orama Filmworks, Indie Entertainme
... 
Jeffrey Allard, Cheryl Dillard Staurulakis, Armin Amiri na Mohammad Dormanesh nibo bari kugira uruhare mukuyitunganya. Ni filime y’abanyaleta zumwe ubumwe za Amerika bafatanyije n’abanya-Irani (Iran), iri mu rurimi rw’icyongereza n’ururimi rw’ikinyaperesi(Persian).
Shahab Hosseini, Niousha Noor, George Maguire n’abandi batandukanye ni bamwe mu bakinnyi bazagaragara muri filime “The Night”.
Kuri iyi taliki ya 29 Mutarama, 2021 kandi, hazajya hanze filime yitwa “The Little Things”. Ni filime yandi
...
unganya filime zirimo iyitwa Gran Via, Warner Bros n’izindi zitandukanye. Bamwe mu batunganya filime(Producers) barimo uwitwa Mark Johnson, John Lee Hancock twabonye haruguru ko yanagize uruhare mu kuyandika no kuyiyobora n’abandi n’abandi, nibo bari kugira uruhare mukuyitunganya. Ni filime y’abanyaleta zumwe ubumwe za Amerika ndetse aha iri mu rurimi rw’icyongereza.
Denzel Washington, Rami Malek, Jared Leto n’abandi batandukanye ni bamwe mu bakinnyi bazagaragara muri filime “The Little Things”.

General Colin Powell, umwirabura wa mbere wabaye ushinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga bwa Amerika yapfuye mu gitondo cya none azize ibibazo bivuye kuri Covid-19, nk’uko umuryango we wabitangaje.
Ku rubuga rwa Facebook, umuryango we wanditse ko yari “yarakingiwe byuzuye”, ushimira abaganga bo ku bitaro bya Walter Reed National Medical Center i Washington D.C aho yavuriwe.
BBC dukesha iyi nkuru yatangaje ko Powell wari ufite imyaka 84, yabaye umusirikare wa Amerika warwanye intambara zo muri Vietnam, nyuma yinjira muri politiki aba umwirabura wa mbere wabaye umujyana mu by’umutekano ku mpera z’ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Ronald Reagan.
Yamenyekanye cyane muri Amerika no mu mahanga nyuma y’intambara yo mu kigobe cya Perse, ndetse hagati mu myaka ya 1990 yafatwaga na bamwe nk’ushobora kuba perezida wa mbere w’umwirabura wa Amerika.
Mu 2000 Perezida George W. Bush yamugize ushinzwe ububanyi n’amahanga bwa Amerika, aba umwirabura wa mbere ugiye muri uwo mwanya w’ubutegetsi.
Icyo gihe Powell yagaragaye kenshi mu muryango w’abibumbye asobanura impamvu y’intambara ya Amerika kuri Iraq, ariko nyuma iyi ntambara yaje kuyita “icyasha” ku izina rye.
Mu 2005 yabwiye ABC News ati: “Yari ibabaje. N’ubu irababaje.”
Powell yari umurepubulikani wafashe urundi ruhande rw’ishyaka rye mu 2008 agashyigikira Barack Obama ku mwanya wa perezida wa repubulika.
Uyu mugabo yabaye umujyanama mu bya gisirikare wizerwa n’abanyapolitiki bakomeye muri Amerika.

Ku wa 25 Gicurasi nibwo RIB yakiriye ikirego cy’Umuyobozi wa Rayon Sports, Munyakazi Sadate, wareze abahoze bayobora iyi kipe kunyereza umutungo wayo ugera hafi kuri miliyari 1 Frw.
Kuva icyo gihe, abayobozi n’abahoze bayobora Rayon Sports batangiye guhamagazwa n’Urwego rw’Igihugu rw’Ubugenzacyaha mu iperereza.
Umuvugizi wa RIB, Dominique Bahorera, yabwiye IGIHE ko bakomeje iperereza ndetse hari ibimenyetso by’ibanze byasabwe abakurikiranywe.
Ati “Iperereza ryaratangiye ndetse hari ibimenyetso by’ibanze basabwe kugira ngo tubigenzure. Turacyari kubigenzura tureba n’abaduha amakuru ahagije.”
Munyakazi Sadate uyobora Rayon Sports kuva tariki ya 14 Nyakanga 2019, ashinja abamubanjirije guhombya ikipe asaga miliyari 1 Frw ndetse no kuba iyi kipe itarishyuye imisoro igera kuri miliyoni 239 Frw hagati ya 2014 na 2016.

Ubuhinde ni bwo buzakira inama y'uyu mwaka, izabera mu murwa mukuru Delhi kuva ku itariki ya 9 kugeza ku ya 10 Nzeri 2023.
Putin yabwiye Modi ko Minisitiri w'ububanyi n'amahanga Sergei Lavrov ari we uzitabira iyo nama mu mwanya we.

... 
yombi.

Itsinda G20 rigizwe n'ibihugu 19 bikize cyane ku isi, kongeraho umuryango w'Ubumwe bw'Uburayi.
Muri iki gihe Ubuhinde ni bwo buyoboye iri tsinda, ubuyobozi bwaryo buhererekanywa buri mwaka hagati y'abanyamuryango.

Mu gihugu ca Zimbabwe, abanyapolitike batari bake bafise umugambi wo kwitoza mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu hamwe n’abakuru b’imigambwe, biyamirije igitero cahatswe kugandagura Prezida Emmerson Mnangagwa, bongera baratera igikumu ku masezerano avuga kw’igikorwa co kwiyamamaza kizoba mu mahoro, mur’iki gihe amatora ategekanijwe mu kwezi kw’indwi.
Haba Mnangagwa canke Nelson Chamisa, umukuru w’ umugambwe ukomeye utavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi MDC, nta n’umwe yari mur’iyo nama, yamara intumwa zabo, zateye igikumu kur’ayo masezerano, yateguwe n’umurwi w’igihugu ujejwe gutsimbataza amahoro hamwe n’ukunywanisha abanyaZimbabwe.
Hari abanyapolitike 23 bamaze gutangaza ko bazokwitoza mu matora y’umukuru w’igihugu ategekanijwe kw’igenekerezo rya 30 ry’ukwezi kw’indwi: Amatora ya mbere azoba abaye, Robert Mugabe yahoze ari prezida w’ico gihugu, atariko aritoza.
Igitero ca grenade cabereye mu gisagara kigira kabiri mu bunini, Bulawayo, aho Mnangagwa yari yakoresheje ikoraniro ku musi wa gatandatu, cahitanye ubuzima bwa babiri mu bafasha ba prezida, kandi ubwo nibwo bwicanyi bwa mbere bubaye kuva igikorwa co kwiyamamaza gitanguye.

Huye: RRA VC yatwaye igikombe itsinze mukeba wayo UTB
Ikipe ya RRA VC mu bagore na REG mu bagabo nizo, kuri iki cyumweru, zatahanye umwanya wa mbere mu irushanwa ngarukamwaka ribaye ku nshuro ya 11 ryo kwibuka Padiri Kayumba Emmanuel, wayoboye GSOB, ryaberaga mu Karere ka Huye.
Muri serie A, RRA VC Yatwaye igikombe nyuma yo gutsinda mukeba wayo UTB set 3-1 (25-16,25-23, 18-25, 25-17), naho REG yatsinze ku mukino wa nyuma UTB set 3-2 (25-20, 24-26, 13-25, 38-36, 15-8).
Ikipe yabaye iya mbere yahawe igikombe ndetse na cheque y'amafaranga 300,000.
Mu mikino ya 1/2 cy'irangiza nayo yari yabanje uwo munsi RRA yari yihereranye KVC iyitsinda set 3-0, mu gihe UTB nayo yari yageze ku mukino wa nyuma nyuma yo gutsinda APR set 3-0.
Iri rushanwa ryabaye ku matariki 7-8 Werurwe muri Serie A mu cyiciro cy'Abagore hitabiriye amakipe 7 (RRA VC, UTB VC, APR VC, KVC, Ruhango VC, IPRC Kigali na IPRC Huye ) naho mu cyiciro cy'Abagabo hitabira amakipe 4 (REG VC, UTB VC, Kirehe na Amicale yaturutse i Burundi).
Padiri Kayumba Emmanuel iri rushanwa ritegurwa mu rwego rwo kumwibuka, yitabye Imana muri 2009 akaba yari umuyobozi wa GSO Butare Indatwa n’Inkesha. Yabaye umwe mu bantu bitanze kandi bagize uruhare mu iterambere ry’umukino wa Volleyball mu Rwanda.

Kwirukanwa k’uyu mugabo ngo byabaye kuri uyu wa kabiri, tariki 22/04/2014 ku kibuga Manchester United yitorezaho, nyuma y’inama yari imaze guhuza abayobozi b’ikipe; nk’uko tubikesha BBC.
Moyes w’imyaka 50 y’amavuko yari yaratoranyijwe na Ferguson ubwe ngo amusimbure umwaka ushize, ubwo yasezeraga ku gutoza Manchester United yatoje imyaka 26.
Mu gihe batarabona undi umusimbura, Manchester United yavuze ko umutoza wayo Ryan Giggs usanzwe ari n’umukinnyi, agiye kuba amusimbuye by’agateganyo. David Moyes ngo azize kuba nta musaruro arimo gutanga.

Urwaruka rwegamiye imigambwe imw’imwe itavuga rumwe n’uwuri ku butegetsi muri komine rugombo mu ntara ya Cibitoke, ruratewe amakenga n’ikarashishi rimaze indwi zibiri rigirwa n’urwaruka rwegamiye umugambwe uri ku butegetsi CNDD-FDD. Iryo karashishi ryari ryarahagaritswe n’uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu mu mwaka wa 2014.
Haraheze indwi zibiri iryo karashishi risubiye gutangura muri komine Rugombo. Abo mu migambwe nka FNL ya Agathon Rwasa ahanini bagizwe n’urwaruka biyamiriza iryo karashishi. Jean Claude Baranyizigiye arongoye urwaruka rwa FNL ku rwego rwa komine Rugombo. Avuga ko iryo karashishi ririmwo amajambo y’iterabwoba.
Mu mugambwe SAHWANYA FRODEBU, Salum Niyonzima arongoye urwaruka rwegamiye uwo mugambwe ku rwego rw’intara yibaza igituma iryo karashishi ryari ryarahagaritswe, ubu ryasubiye gutangura.
Muri CNDD-FDD bararahira bakarengwa ko iryo karashishi ridakorwa n’imbonerakure za CNDD-FDD. Bienvenu Ndayambaje arongoye umuhari w’imbonerakure muri komine Rugombo asigura ko iryo karashishi rikorwa na Club Inkona nk’uko iyindi mirwi yitunganya igakora ikarashishi.
Hagati mu mwaka wa 2014, niho uwahoze ari umushikiranganji w’intwaro yo hagati mu gihugu Edouard Nduwimana yahagarika ikarashishi ryakorwa n’urwaruka rwegamiye imigambwe. Intandaro n’uko iryo karashishi ryavugirwamwo amajambo yo gusomborotsanya, ibitutsi n’iterabwoba.

Umutoza ukomoka mu gihugu cy’ubudage Thomas Tuchel wahoze utoza ikipe ya Chelsea yo mu gihugu cy’ubwomgereza, nyuma yo kwirukanywa muri iyi kipe ari guhatirwa gusohoka muri iki gihugu.
Thomas Tuchel yirukanywe muri Chelsea mu ntangiriro z’ukwezi kwa Nzeri nyuma yo gutsindwa mu mukino wa Champions league na Dinamo Zagreb, aho nyuma y’iminsi mike yahise asimburwa na Graham Potter.
Thomas Tuchel yageze mu bwongereza mu gihe iki gihugu cyari cyicyemerera abavuye hanze y’ubwongereza gukorera kuri Visa zisanzwe, byose bikaba byaratewe n’iva ry’ubwongereza mu muryango w’ubumwe bw’Uburayi( Bre-exit) aho iminsi ashigaje itarengeje 90 gusa akaba avuye mu bwongereza ku bubi na bwiza.
Thomas Tuchel wari usanzwe utuye mu gace ka Cogham hakaba hanabarizwa ikibuga cy’imyitozo cya Chelsea ahangaha kandi akaba ari naho umwana we w’umukobwa yiga.
Thomas Tuchel yageze mu bwongereza avuye mu gihugu cy’ubufaransa aho yatozaga ikipe ya Paris Saint Germain, akigera muri iyi kipe yahise ahesha iyi kipe igikombe cya Champions league itsinze Manchester City.

Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Ubwongereza n’Ubufaransa vyakoze ibitero bitari bike mu gihugu ca Siriya, inyuma y’indwi imwe gusa habaye ibitero vy’ubumara muri ico gihugu.
Amakuru dukesha iradiyo y’abafaransa RFI, amenyesha ko ivyo bitero vyabaye isaha icenda z’ijoro,mu masaha yo mu Bufaransa vyari bitumbereye ahanini ahari ibirwanisho vy’ubumara mu gihugu ca Siriya.
Ikibanza gikomeye catewe ni ikibanza kiri hafi y’umurwa mukuru wa Siriya Damas, kikaba cari cagumye gitungwa urutoki n’abarongozi b’igihugu c’Ubufaransa.
Ibindi bitero bibiri vyabaye ku bigo biri hafi y’igisagara ca Homs, hagati mu gihugu ca Siriya, mw’ishirahamwe rijejwe gukingira agateka ka zina muntu muri Siriya bavuga ko hoba hari n’ikirindiro c’abasirikare ba Siriya catewe.
Ku ruhande rw’Uburusiya bwagirijwe kuva kera gushigikira Reta ya Siriya, bemeje ko ata kirindiro na kimwe c’ico gihugu cashikiwe n’ivyo bitero.
Igisirikare ca Siriya kirwanira mu kirere caciye naco gisubiza ibitero vya misire, ariko ku ruhande rwa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, bemeza ko ata muntu n’umwe wabo yahasize ubuzima.

Afurika Yunze Ubumwe (African Union -AU), igiye gufasha ibihugu bigize umuryango wa Afurika y’i Burasirazuba (EAC) ibiha inkingo (doze) za COVID-19 miliyoni 35.
U Rwanda ubu rufite umubare w’abamaze kwandura Covid-19 n’abo ihitana ukomeje kwiyongera,kuko abayanduye barenga ibihumbi 10 mu gihe abo yahitanye ari 128, ruri mu bihugu bizahabwa izo nkingo.
Biteganyijwe ko u Rwanda ruzahabwa doze miliyoni 2 n’ibihumbi 600 mu gihe u Burundi na Sudani y’Epfo buri gihugu kizahabwa doze miliyoni 2 n’ibihu
... 
er izagenera Afurika doze miliyoni 50, mu gihe Johnson & Johnson izatanga izigera kuri miliyoni 120, hanyuma AstraZeneca izatanga doze miliyoni 100. Zikazatangwa bitarenze mu mpera za Werurwe uyu mwaka.
Perezida Ramaphosa avuga ko hariho gahunda yo gufasha ibihugu bikennye kubona uru rukingo ku bufatanye bw’ishami rya Loni ryita ku buzima (OMS) Gavi Vaccine Alliance initiative.
Afurika ifite gahunda yo gukingira abayituye 60% ni ukuvuga abasaga miliyoni 780 ku bayituye basaga miliyari 1 na miliy
...
anzwe rukoresha mu kubika neza inkingo ngo zitangirika, gusa byo bikagira umwihariko w’uko bishobora kuzikonjesha ku kigero cya dogere -40 na -86.
Kugeza ubu abatuye Afurika basaga miliyoni eshatu bamaze kwandura iki cyorezo, abagera ku 72,805 cyarabahitanye, Afurika y’epfo ifite umubare munini w’abanduye ni kimwe mu bihugu bikeneye izi nkingo nyinshi. Iki gihugu kimaze gupfusha abantu 33,163, ku banduye 1,231,597, ijanisha ry’abapfa rigeze kuri 57.4%.
Igihugu Abapfa % ry’abapfa Abamaze kwandura

Tz | Rayvanny nawe ari mu bazohiganwa muri BET 2017
Rayvanny nawe yagiye mu gitigiri c’abahiganwa muri BET 2017 , aho azoba barikumwe na bagenziwe nka Eddy Kenzo kuva mu bugande.
Umuririmvyi Raymond benshi bazi nka Rayvanny kuva mu gihugu ca Tanzania, ari mu baririmvyi nagiye guhiganirwa udushimwe mw’ihiganwa BET Awards muri leta zunze ubumwe za amerika ahitwa Los Angeles muri uku kwezi kwa gatandatu. Akazoba ari mu muce wiswe International Viewer’s Choice Awards.
Uwo muririmvyi akaba ari wenyene agiye guseruka Tanzania. Nkuko amakuru dukesha Bongo5 abishikiriza ngo uwo muririmvyi azoba barikumwe na bagenziwe nka Eddy Kenzo ava mu gihugu c’ubugande.
Abandi baririmvyi bariko barabonekamwo ni nka Davido, Wizkid, tekno, Mr Eaze hamwe n’abandi nka AKA akomoka muri afrika y’epfo.

... 
 rikaba ukumuhora iruhande mu bwiyoroshye.

Bemeye kubana na we maze bahabwa n’ububasha bwo kwirukana roho mbi. ...
e abanzi bacu. Dawudi wo mu Isezerano rya kera, ntakaturushe kurangwa n’ineza. Twiyumviye ukuntu yababariye umwanzi we Sawuli. Nyuma y’aho Urukiko rw’ikirenga rwa Kenya rufatiye icyemezo ko amatora ya Perezida yabaye ku ya 08 Kanama 2017 agomba gusubirwamo kuko hari ibyo atubahirije, bamwe mu banyapolitiki bakomeje kugaragarwaho na disikuru zuzuye amagambo y’amacakubiri.
Ibi ngo biteye impungenge abaturage b’iki gihugu mu gihe bitegura kujya mu yandi matora y’umukuru w’igihugu, azahatanamo Uhuru Kenyatta na Raila Odinga, abanyapolitiki batavuga rumwe bityo bikaba byatuma abenegihugu bacikamo ibice bigateza imvururu ziko
... 
o ku mbuga nkoranyambaga, aho abaturage basanzwe babwirana amagambo mabi ashingiye ku macakubiri y’amoko. Baterana amagambo buri ruhande rugambirira ko nibadatsinda amatora y’umukuru w’igihugu ateganyijwe, bazihora».
Ku itariki ya 11 Nzeri 2017, hari Umudepite n’Umusenateri batawe muri yombi barafungwa kubera ko bakekwaho amacakubiri. Ati «Senateri Johnson Muthama wo mu ruhande rutavuga rumwe n’ubutegetsi araregwa kwita Uhuru Kenyatta umusinzi.
Naho intumwa ya rubanda Moses Kuria wo mu ishyaka r
...
i, naho Abakalenjine bagatora Raila Odinga».
Icyakora, kuva uwo mudepite avugiye mu ruhame iyo disikuru y’amacakubiri, ishyaka riri ku butegetsi ryahise ritangaza ko ryitandukanyije na we. Komisiyo y’igihugu y’ubumwe no kugarura ibintu mu buryo (NCIC), yahise itangira igikorwa cy’iperereza ku bantu 273 bakekwaho gukwirakwiza amacakubiri. Iyi komisiyo, iratangaza ko abishoye muri ibi bikorwa ngo byikubye inshuro 3 ku byaha byagaragaye mu byumweru 10 bya mbere y’amatora ya Perezida.

Wawundi ati ukuri guherera mukuyaga.
-Mwari muzi igituma ku Mukaza hahinduwe izina hakitwa *ROHERO*?
-Mwari muzi igituma kuva ku 1965 ku Ntwaro yabahima abapresident nka Micombero, Bagaza na Buyoya batakorera imisi mikuru y’igihugu muri stade Prince Louis Rwagasore?
Neza naneza mw’ihinyabwoko ryakorewe abahutu muri 1972 harya mu kibuga hari ibuye bahonderako abahutu bita ngo ni *babararuhiga* nk’uko mwama muvyumva mu ndirimbo ya bararuhiga, muri icogihe urumutu umanutse Bujumbura baca bakuzana kuri stade Prince Louis bagaca batora inyundo bagahondera kuri rya Buye mumutwe umuntu *AKAROHA* Rimwe gusa! Umuhutu amanutse wese baca bavugango mujane hamwe baroha rimwe gusa nyuma hahava hitwa mw’IROHERO niho ryavuye na bugingo nubu.
Bivanye nuko amaraso y’ *ABERANDA* ahuma, nyuma y’ivyo bibi vyakorewe muri ico kibuga inkuba yahakubise incuro zibiri yimba izura maraso yabahutu bahapfiriye ikimba kugeza kumetero zibiri. Nyuma abo bahima baba président mwabonye hejuru kubera bari bazi ko aribo bari hejuru yamaraso ariko aramenekera mûri ico kibanza y’inzirakarengane,niho baca batinya gusubira kuhagirira amakoraniro kuko bibazako inkuba yohahava ibasangayo ikabasasika namwango icogihe ababa bari muri iyo stade baba ari abahima gusa! Nicogituma 2005 ariho mwabonye hatangura kuberayo imisi mikuru kuko ato biyagiriza bahakoreye mu gihe abahima barongowe na Buyoya, Bagaza, na Micombero bari barahagize indahiro.

Umutoza ukomoka mu gihugu cy'u Bubiligi, yatoje amakipe abiri ya hano mu Rwanda, ariyo Rayon Sports yatoje mu bihe bibiri bitandukanye muri 2015, no muri 2018, anatoza Mukura Victory Sports muri 2017, yahishuye ko abakinnyi bane aribo bamushimishije cyane ubwo yatozaga mu Rwanda.

Ikigendajuru c'Ubushinwa kiriko kiratibuka kizoshika kw'isi ku wa mbere
Ibimanyu vy'ikigendajuru c'Ubushinwa biriko biratibuka, vyitezwe gushika kw'isi ku munsi wa mbere, nkuko abahinga babikurikirana babimenyesheje.
Ikigo c'Ubushinwa kigenzura ibigendajuru "China's space agency" kivuga kw'ico kigendajuru citezwe gushika mu kirere "atmosphere" mu masaha 24 akurikira - nkuko vyemejwe n'ikigo ca Buraya kigenzura ibigendajuru "European Space Agency" (ESA).
Ikigendajuru Tiangong-1 cashitse iyo cari 
... 
muhingamo gushika ku wa mbere mu gitondo.
Vyitezwe ko ibihimba vyinshi vy'ico kigendajuru bisha bigeze mu kirere bita "atmosphere", ariko ngo bimwe murivyo bishobora kugwa kw'isi.
Ikigo c'Ubushinwa kigenzura ibigendajuru cavugiye ku mbuga hwaniro, ko ibigendajuru bigwa kw'isi "bitagwa kw'isi nka kurya kwo mu masinema ya "science-fiction", ahubwo ko biza nk'imvura y'ibimanyu".
Kizogwa he?
Ubushinwa bwavuze mu 2016 ko butakigenzura ikigendajuru Tiangong-1, ko butazi aho gishobora kugwira.
Ikigo ES
...
ocitega.
Kizogwa gute?
Bivugwa ko kizotangura gusha hasigaye ibirometero 100 ngo gishike kw'isi, niko Dr Elias Aboutanios, w'ikigo c'ibigendajuru ca Australia yavuze.
Ngo ntawuzi ibihimba vyaco bizosigara, naho vyogwa.
Birakwiye ko umuntu agira amakenga?
Nta na gato. Ibihimba vy'ico kigendajuru gipima itoni 8.5 bizosambuka igihe kizoba cinjiye muri "atmosphere".
Hari ibipande bishobora kudasha nk'amatanki y'ibitoro, canke ivy'imoteri, ariko ngo naho vyogwa kw'isi, ngo biragoye ko bigwa ku muntu.

Umunya-Cote d’Ivoire ukinira ikipe ya OGC Nice, Jean Michaël Seri ni we wegukanye igikombe kitiriwe Marc-Vivien Foe ubwo kuri iki cyumweru yatorwaga nk’umukinnyi w’umunyafurika warushije abandi muri shampiyona y’Ubufaransa.
Abanyamakuru 66 batoranyijwe na RFI mu gutora umukinnyi ukomoka kuri uyu mugabane wahize abandi muri Ligue 1, baje gutora uyu mukinnyi wo hagati ukinnira Nice, aho muri uyu mwaka amaze gutsinda ibitego bitandatu ndetse anatanga imipira 10 yavuyemo ibindi(assists).
Iki gihembo umwaka ushize cyari cyatwawe n’umunya Marooc wo muri Lille Sofiane Boufal, Seri uyu mwaka akaba acyegukanye aje imbere y’umunya Algerie Ryad Boudebouz ndetse n’umunya Cameroon Benjamin Moukandjo.
Prix Marc-Vivien Foé ni igihembo kitiriwe uyu munyacameroon Marc-Vivien Foé waguye mu kibuga mu gikombe mpuzamigabane, aho kuva mu mwaka wa 2009 gihabwa umukinnyi w’umunyafurika wahize abandi muri shampiyona y’Abafaransa.
Uko abakinnyi bakurikiranye kuri iki cyumweru

Reta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika zimenyesha ko zashimishijwe n’ingingo yafashwe n’igihugu ca Republika Iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo yo kurungika Ladislas Ntaganzwa mu gihugu c’Urwanda gucirirwayo urubanza kuvyaha bitandukanye birimwo ivya Jenoside hamwe n’ivyaha vyo gohohotera agateka kamuntu yakoze.
Mw’itangazo yasohoye ejo kuwa gatatu, Amerika imenyesha ko ako ari akarorero keza mubijanye no gukorera hamwe mubijanye n’ubutungane hagati y’ibihugu vyo mu karere.
Ntaganzwa abaye umuntu agira gatandatu yagirizwa na sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha yashiriweho ku Rwanda yafashwe na Republika iharanira Demokarasi ya Kongo yoherejwe mu Rwanda gucirirwayo urubanza.
Amerika irashima kandi abo bose bagize uruhara mur’ico gikorwa co kurungika Ntaganzwa mu Rwanda kandi isaba ko utwo twigoro twobandanya kugira n’abandi bagirizwa ihonyabwoko n’ibindi vyaha vyakorewe mu Rwanda bafatwe.
Abantu indwi bagirizwa ivyaha vy’ihonyabwoko mu Rwanda nibo bakiriko bararonderwa, Amerika imenyesha ko izobandanya ifasha mu kubashengeza imbere y’ubutungane.

Nyuma yaho komisiyo y’igihugu yo kurwanya jenoside, CNLG, itangaje ko mu mwaka wa 2019/2020 habonetse imibiri isaga 800 y’abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi, abagize inteko ishinga amategeko basanga icyo ari ikibazo gikomeye ndetse kibangamiye inzira y’ubwiyunge bw’abanyarwanda.
Raporo y’ibikorwa bya CNLG byo mu mwaka wa 2019/2020 igaragaza ko ibyaha by’ingengabitekerezo ya Jenoside n’ibifitanye isano nayo bigera kuri 246 ari byo byagaragaye mu gihe cyo kwibuka ku nshuro ya 26 jenoside yakorewe abatutsi ndetse bikaba byaramaze gushyikirizwa ubushinjacyaha ngo bubikurikirane mu nkiko.
Iyi raporo yerekana kandi ko mu mwaka w’ingengo y’imari ushize hanabonetse imibiri 808 y’abazize jenoside yakorewe abatutsi yagiye ikurwa hirya no hino mu turere.
Ubwo CNLG yagezaga iyi raporo ku nteko ishinga amategeko imitwe yombi, abadepite n’abasenateri bagaragaje ko kuba nyuma y’imyaka 26 hakiboneka imibiri kandi nabwo amakuru yaho iherereye ntatangwe ku bushake, ari ikimenyetso cy’uko hari intambwe itaraterwa mu guhangana n’ingengabitekerezo ya jenoside, ibintu bemeza ko ari inzitizi mu rugendo rw’ubumwe n’ubwiyunge.

Umutoza mushya w'umufaransa, Thierry Froger watoje amakipe arimo Lille yageze mu Rwanda aho aje gutoza ikipe ya APR FC.
Uyu mugabo uje gusimbura Ben Moussa wasoje amasezerano ye, yageze mu Rwanda mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa Kane tariki ya 20 Nyakanga 2023.
Thierry Froger ufite ibyangombwa by'ubutoza by'ikirenga bya UEFA Pro, akaba yazanye n'umwungiriza we Khouda Karim bakoranye muri USM Alger.
Ubwo bari bageze ku kibuga cy'indege mpuzamahanga cya Kigali i Kanombe, yakiriwe n'umunyamabanga w'iyi kipe, Masabo Michel ndetse na Team Manager, Rtd Cpt Eric Ntazinda.
Thierry Froger ni umutoza w'umufaransa w'imyaka 60 yakiniye Lille, Grenobles na Le Mans zo mu Bufaransa.
Yatoje amakipe menshi atandukanye nka Le Mans, Châteauroux, Lille, Reims, Nîmes zo mu Bufaransa, ku mugabane wa Afurika yatoje amakipe nka TP Mazempe, USM Alger na Arta/Solar7 aherukamo. Yanatoje ikipe y'igihugu ya Togo.

Umukuru w’umugwi w’igihugu wigenga uharanira agateka ka muntu mu Burundi avuga ko ubwicanyi bushobora kuba bwimonoje, ariko ko inyishu y’ico kibazo si uguhunga
Mu Burundi, hari imisore ifise ubwoba bwo kwicwa, kubera batavuga rumwe n’intwaro y’iki gihe. Haraheze imisi 15 imisore 5 ihungiye mu nyubakwa z'umurwi w'igihugu wigenga uharanira agateka ka muntu. Iyo misore ivuga ko itinya kwicwa, igasaba ko ihungishwa ikarungikwa mu mahanga.
Ariko Furera Ntakarutimana Emmanuel, arongoye umugwi w’igihugu wigenga uharanira agateka ka muntu, avuga ko abarundi bavuga ko ubwicanyi bwimonoje ari benshi, ariko ko inyishu y’ico kibazo atari uguhunga. Iyo misore ivuga ko hoba hari n’umugambi bise "SAFISHA" wo kwica aba FNL bose bayoboka Rwasa Agathon, ariko leta irabihakana

Santiago Gonzalez Cazorla wari umaze igihe kirekire ari umukinnyi wa Arsenal yamaze kwerekeza muri Villa Real yo muri Espagne, nyuma y’uko Arsenal yemeye kumurekura ngo agende.
Kuri uyu wa kabiri ni bwo ikipe ya Villa Real ibicishije kuri Twitter yayo yatangaje ko uyu musore yayisubiyemo ku ncuro ya gatatu.
“Uyu munsi dufite ikintu cy’ingenzi cyo kubabwira kuko ari igihe cyo kongera kubona umuntu ukunzwe n’aba Groguets(Abafana ba Villa Real). Kaze neza nanone Santi Cazorla.”
Cazorla yari amaze igihe kirekire adakinira Arsenal, nyuma y’imvune ikomeye yagize mu Ukwakira 2016.
Biteganyijwe ko uyu musore azaba umukinnyi w’iyi kipe byemewe n’amategeko ku wa 01 Nyakanga, ubwo isoko ry’igura n’igurisha ku mugabane w’Uburayi rizaba ryafunguye imiryango.

Uruganda ruteranya imodoka mu Rwanda rwa Volkswagen kuri uyu wa Kabiri tariki 29 Ukwakira 2019 ruratangira ku mugaragaro gahunda yo guteranya no gukoresha imodoka zikoresha amashanyarazi. Ubuyobozi bw’uru ruganda buvuga ko ku ikubitiro izi modoka zizajya zitwarwa n’abashoferi bahuguwe n’icyo kigo gusa.
Mu muhango wabereye mu Kigali Convention Center, Minisitiri w’intebe Bwana Edouard Ngirente yafunguye ku mugaragaro itangira ry’ikoreshwa ry’imodoka zikoresha amashanyarazi mu Rwanda.
U Rwanda ni cyo gihugu cya mbere ku mugabane wa Afurika uru ruganda rwa Volkswagen ruzanyemo izi modoka zarwo zikoresha amashanyarazi.
Micaëla Rugwizangonga uyobora uruganda rwa Volkswagen mu Rwanda avuga ko ku ikubitiro izi modoka zitazagurishwa ahubwo zizakora mu mushinga wa MOVE wo gutwara abantu bakishyurira urugendo ku biciro bigenwa hifashishijwe ikoranabuhanga.
Ni umushingaVolkswagen izakoranamo n’ikindi kigo cy’Abadage cya SIEMENS. Ubuyobozi bwa VW bukagaragaza ko bukomeje guhugura abashoferi bazajya batwara izo modoka.
Ubuyobozi bw’iki kigo buvuga ko imiterere y’ubucuruzi bateganyirije u Rwanda ahanini ari ugukodesha imodoka ku bakeneye ko zibatwara bikozwe n’abashoferi ba VW. imibare yatangajwe na Micaëla Rugwizangonga yerekana ko baherutse gushyira imodoka zisaga 200 mu mihanda ya Kigali zikaba zitwara byibura abagenzi basaga ibihumbi 30 aho ku munsi ngo bakora byibura ingendo ibihumbi 13.

Stephen Keshi yitavye Imana afise imyaka 54
Umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'imirwi y'umupira w'amaguru muri Nigeria, amenyesha ko Afrika yabuze umwe mu bamenyereza bayo bakomeye, Stephen Keshi.
Umunya Nigeria Stephen Keshi, yitavye Imana afise imyaka 54, bikekwa ko yoba yazize ingwara y'umutima.
Uyu mugabo yigeze gutwara umurwi nserukiragihugu wa Nigeria, Keshi ari muri babiri bashoboye gushikana Nigeria ku gutwara igikombe ca Afrika c'ibihugu, rimwe nk'umukinyi ahandi naho nk'umumenyereza.
Yaranabereye umumenyereza w'imirwi ya Togo na Mali.
Icegera c'umukuru w'ishirahamwe ry'umupira w'amaguru Shehu Dikko, yavuze ko Stephen Kesh yabereye icitegererezo abanya Nigeria benshi mu gihe c'imyaka myinshi.
Abagenzi biwe bavuga ko atigeze asubira kumera neza, inyuma y'urupfu rw'umukenyezi wiwe yahitanywe na cancer mu mwaka uheze.

Antoine Christophe Agbepa Mumba wamenyekanye ku Isi nka Koffi Olomide ategerejwe mu Rwanda mu ntangiriro z’Ukuboza,2021 mu gitaramo kitaratangazwaho byinshi.
Uyu muhanzi uri mu bakomeye Afurika yagize kugeza ubu, aherutse kujyanwa mu nkiko z’u Bufaransa kubera abagore bane bamuregaga kubahohotera mu buryo bw’igitsina.
Abo bagore bahoze ari ababyinnyi be muri Groupe yashinze ikamenyekana yise Quartier Latin.
BBC iherutse kwandika ko mu mwaka wa 2012, Antoine Agbepa Mumba, yabajijwe n’urukiko k’ug
... 
byo gufata ku ngufu cyangwa gufatira abantu.
Kuri we, biriya birego ni ibihimbano by’abo bagore bane byo kugira ngo babone uko baguma mu Bufaransa.
Hari izindi manza kiriya cyamamare gikomoka mu cyahoze ari Zaïre cyarezwemo.
Mu mwaka wa 2018, ubuyobozi bwa Zambia bwategetse ko afatwa kubera gusagarira gafotozi.
Ubwo yari ageze i Nairobi muri Kenya mu mwaka wa 2016, Koffi Olomide yahise asubizwa aho yari avuye nyuma yo gukubita umugeri umwe mu babyinnyi be ubwo bari bacyururuka indege.
Iki gikorw
...
 mu mpera z’umwaka wa 2016.
Hari mu gitaramo yakoreye muri Kigali Convention Center.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko, Koffi Olomide ni umuhanzi ukomeye.
Zimwe mu ndirimbo yakoze zamenyekanye cyane hari izasohotse kuri Album yise Papa Bonheur, Loi, Effrakata n’izindi nyinshi.
Mu buhanzi bwe kandi yiyise amazina menshi ari yo Quadra Kora Man, Grand Mopao Mokonzi, Patraõ, Le Rambo, Nkolo Lupemba, Mokolo Bilanga, Ackram Ojé, Légende, L’Homme Aux Mille Idées, Jeune Pato, Le Grand Ché, Milkshake n’andi menshi.

Inama ya ONU ishinzwe kubahiriza agateka ka zina muntu kur’uyu wa gatanu yafashe ingingo yo kwongereza umwaka umwe ikiringo c’umurwi w’abahinga ba ONU ushinzwe gutohoza ku vyaha vyoba vyarakorewe mu Burundi naho ico gihugu kitavyemera.
Ico cemezo, categuwe n’umuryango w’ubumwe bwa Buraya, ushigikiwe na Reta zunze ubumwe z’Amerika cemejwe n’ibihugu 22, ibihugu 11 birimwo Ubushinwa, Misiri, Afrika y’epfo na Ghana biragihakana, ibindi 14 birimwo Kenya na Kote d’Ivuware vyahisemwo kutagira ico bashi
... 
ashwe mu gihe umusi umwe imbere y’aho urwo rwego nyene rwa ONU rwemeje icemezo ca mbere ku Burundi, cashikirijwe n’umurwi w’ibihugu vya Afrika bifatanije n’Uburundi isaba irungikwa ry’abahinga batatu ba ONU gutohoza ku gateka ka muntu.
Abo bahinga batatu bashigikiwe n’ibihugu vya Afrika, bazoba bashinzwe gutororokanya amakuru kw’ihohoterwa ry’ihonyangwa ry’agateka ka muntu mu Burundi. Ariko aho itandukaniye n’umurwi wa ONU nuko basabwa kuzoha ivyo batohoje ubutungane bw’Uburundi nabwo buzoce buk
...
atumye ibihugu vya Burayi bihakana icemezo c’umurwi w’Abanyafrika, bisigura ko ata kuri kuzovamwo.
Umurwi utohoza ku Burundi washinzwe mu kwezi kw’icenda 2016, yasavye sentare mpuzamakungu mpanavyaha gutohoza vuba bwango ku guhohotera agateka kazina muntu n’ibindi vyaha bishobora kuba vyarakozwe n’abategetsi b’Uburundi.
Uburundi bwashikirije urwandiko CPI ko buvavanuye nayo, iyo nayo ifise gushika kw’itariki ya 27 z’ukwezi kwa cumi 2017 kugira izobe yatanguje amatohoza ku Burundi.

U Rwanda runaniwe gukura intsinzi kuri Kenya mu mukino wa kabiri mu itsinda E wo gushaka itike yo kujya mu gikombe cy’Isi muri Qatar 2021, iminota 90 y’umukino yarangiye amakipe yombi anganya igitego 1-1.
Ku gicamunsi cyo kuri iki Cyumweru, tariki 5 Nzeri 2021, ikipe y’u Rwanda y’umupira w’amaguru mu bagabo Amavubi yakiriye ikipe ya Kenya kuri Stade ya Kigali, ni umukino watangiye ku isaha ya saa cyenda zuzuye i Kigali (3:00pm).
... 
ya 1 Nzeri 2021.
Amavubi ananiwe gutsinda Kenya, iminota icyenda yari ihagije ngo Harambe Stars ifungure amazamu. Ni igitego cyatsinzwe na Michael Olunga.
Kwishyura iki gitego byasabye Amavubi iminota 12 agaruka mu mukino. Ku munota wa 21 kapiteni Haruna Niyonzima yahaye umupira Rwatubyaye Abdul, maze ku ishoti riremereye yishyura igitego.
Ni igitego cyatumye igice cya mbere amakipe anganya kimwe ku kindi, ari nako umukino waje kurangira nta kipe yongeye kureba mu izamu.

 Imanishimwe Emmanuel bakunze kwita Mangwende, Djihad Bizimana, Yannick Mukunzi na kapiteni Haruna Niyonzima, Jaques Tuyisenge na Byiringiro Lague waje gusimbura na Kagere Meddy kubera imvune yagize ku munota wa 28.
Kugeze ubu u Rwanda mu itsinda E rurimo mu mikino yo gushaka itike y’igikombe cy’Isi kizaba umwaka utaha muri Qatar rufite inota rimwe gusa.
Umukino ukurikira Amavubi azacakirana n’ikipe y’igihugu ya Uganda. Undi mukino wo mu itsinda E utegerejwe kuri uyu wa Mbere Uganda yakira Mali.

Ni imikino ya gicuti irimo guhuza amakipe y’ingimbi zitarengeje imyaka 17 y’ibihugu bitatu; U Rwanda, Tanzania na Cameroon irimo gukinirwa mu Rwanda guhera tariki 28 Werurwe ikazasozwa tariki 4 Mata 2019.
Umukino wa mbere ikipe y’igihugu y’u Rwanda yatsinzwe na Cameroon 3 -1.
Umukino wa kabiri wakinwe kuri uyu wa mbere ikipe y’igihugu ya Tanzania yatsinze 2-1 Cameroon.
Tanzania yafunguye amazamu ku munota wa kenda w’umukino ku gitego cya kapiteni wayo Abraham Maurice nyuma yo gucenga ba myugariro ba Cameroon.
Ikipe zombi zakomeje gusatirana cyane kuko ni umukino warimo ishyaka ryinshi ku mpande zombi.
Ku munota wa 52 w’umukino Cameroon yaje kwishyura igitego ibifashijwemo na Yannick Noah.
Igitego gihesha Tanzania gishimangira intsinzi cyabonetse ubwo umusifuzi yongeyeho iminota 3 gitsinzwe na Swakali Arafat ku mupira w’umuterekano yateye igana mu izamu.
Ni imikino yateguwe na FERWAFA ku bufatanye na BINEWA.
BINEWA Sports Management ni kampani ikorera muri Cameroon ikora ibintu byo gushakira ikipe (clubs) ndetse n’ikipe z’ibihugu imikino ya gicuti.
Ikipe y’igihugu ya Cameroon na Tanzania z’abatarengeje imyaka 17 ziritegura imikino y’igikombe cya Africa muri iki kiciro kizabera muri Tanzania guhera tariki 14 – 28 Mata 2019.
U Rwanda ruzakina na Tanzania ku wa kane tariki 4 Mata kuri stade ya Kigali saa 15:30.
Mu mikino yo gushaka itike y’igikombe cya Africa cy’abatarengeje imyaka 17 u Rwanda rwasezerewe na Tanzania muri 1/2.
Yvonne IRADUKUNDA

Ni nde uwushaka ibiziga vyatowe mu Rweru?
Umunyezamu akorera ku cambu ca Dagaza, hafi y'ahahambwe ibiziga bine vyagaragaye mu kiyaga Rweru mu kwezi guheze, yabwiye BBC ko yabonye abantu baje n'ubwato bubiri bufise imoteri.
Ngo yagerageje guhamagara abari muri ubwo bwato ntibamwishura, niko kuca arya akara umukuru w'icambu, hari nk'isaha indwi z'ijoro.
Uwo munyezamu avuga ko abo bantu babonye abasirikare b'Uburundi barwanira mu mazi b'Inzove, berekeje iyo bari, baca bafata ubwato bajemwo basubira
... 
a kuzura ivyo biziga bazananye.
Ico bikoze ariko, abarovyi bakorera aho ku kiyaga Rweru bemeza ko baheruka kubona umuntu yaje aturuka mu Kirundo, yafashe amafoto y'aho ivyo biziga vyahambwe, n'aho ibirindiro vy'abasirikare b'iBurundi biri.
Uwo muntu mu nyuma ngo yaciye afata ubwato bwamujabukanye hakurya mu Rwanda, nk'uko abamutwaye bavyiganiye umunyamakuru wa BBC, Cyriaque Muhawenayo.

Mu Rwanda nta shampiyona ishoboka abafana batemewe ku bibuga, kuko hari amakipe menshi adashobora kubona amikoro akeneye nta kiva ku bibuga. Gushaka kwigana abanyaburayi kandi bo amenshi mu mafranga bayavana mu ba sponsors babo na droits TV, ni ugukabya kwisumbukuruza.

Umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire wa Amerika, John Kerry, yaricaranye mu biganiro ku musi wa kabiri n’umushikiranganji ajejwe imigenderanire w’Uburusiya, Sergei Lavrov.
Yamara abo bategetsi batangaje kw’uruhagara mu gihugu ca Syria, umurwi Islamic State, n’uruhagara mu gihugu ca Ukraine, arivyo bibazo vy'ukwihweza mu nama yabo i Moscou, aho John Kerry, agize urugendo rugira kabiri muri uyu mwaka.
Bwana Kerry avuga ko naho hari ivyo batumvikanako, bashoboye gukorana neza kqu bibazo bimwe bimwe. Amenyesha kw’Uburusiya bwagize intererano ikomeye mu biganiro ku masezerano yerekeye umugambi wa nucleaire w’igihugu ca Irani.
Akoresheje uwuhindura mu Cyongereza, umushikiranganaji ajejwe imigenderanire w’Uburusiya, Sergei Lavrov, yatangaje ko ashaka kubandanya ibiganiro vyatanguwe na prezida w’Uburusiya, Vladimir Putin, na prezida wa Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Barack Obama, ku kungene Amerika, zishobora gufasha ku vyerekeye gutorera inyishu ikibazo co mu gihugu ca Ukraine.

Ibihugu byo ku mugabane wa Afurika bigiye kwakira inkingo za Koronavirusi zakozwe n’ikigo Johnson and Johnson zigera kuri miliyoni 400 ku bufatanye n’Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe.Mu itangazo cyashyize ahagaragara kuri uyu wa mbere, iki kigo cy’Abanyamerika gikora ibikoresho by’ubuvuzi cyavuze ko gishobora gutanga dose zigera kuri miliyoni 220 ku bihugu 55 bigize Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe nibura mu gihembwe cya gatatu cya 2021.Izindi doze miliyoni 180 zishobora gutangwa umwaka utaha. Aya masezerano akurikira ayo Umuryango wa Afurika Yunze Ubumwe wagiranye n’ibigo bya AstraZeneca, Pfizer ndetse n’Ikigo cy’Abarusiya gikora inkingo za Sputnik.

Ubu buryo bwombi buherereye muri za proteins z’iriya virus k’uburyo buyifasha kwinjira no kuzahaza umuntu mu buryo bwihuse.

Inyuma y’aho Youssuf Mossi ajejwe igisata co gutunganya inkino mw’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Burundi FFB ku mboneshakure ya Azam yo muri Tanzania amenyeshereje y’uko mu ntango z’ukwezi kwa Ruheshi 2020 ihiganwa rya Primus league rishobora kubandanya, kuri uyu wa wa gatatu igenekerezo rya 06 Rusama 2020 , umukuru w’ishirahamwe ry’umupira w’amaguru mu Burundi nawe yagize ico ashikiriza kuvyerekeye inkino zisigaye.
Abicishije ku rubuga ngurukana Facebook rwiwe Honorable Reverien Ndikuriyo akaba yavuze y’uko amahiganwa y’umupira w’amaguru ategekanijwe mu gihugu azorangizwa kandi neza .

Inyuma y’imyiyamamazo yo kwitegurira amatora arangiye hazoca hasohoka ikirangamisi c’inkino zisigaye ( 3 Journeé za Championat National n’igikombe c’Umukuru w’igihugu 1/2 final na Final )”.
Mukamenya y’uko ibihugu bimwe bimwe bimaze guhagarika amahiganwa y’uno mwaka bivanye n’ikiza ca Coronavirus kimaze amezi kiriko gitikiza inganda kw’isi.
