Ingabo za Onu muri Centrafrique mu mazi abira
Abasirkare bagiye kugarukana amahoro mu gihugu ca Centrafrique, baragirizwa kubagura abana bo muri ico gihugu.
Inkuru zitangwa n’itororokanirizo ry’amakuru rya AP, uwurongoye akanama kajejwe agateka ka zina muntu muri Onu, Zeid Raad al-Hussein, yemeje ko abana batandatu bandi bakubaguwe n’abasirikare ba Buraya.
Ivyo n’ivyo kuva mu 2014, mw’ikambi y’impuzi y’abateshejwe izabo, iruhande y’ikibuga c’indege ca Bangui.
Ibiro vya Al-Hussein, bivuga ko abategetsi ba Onu babajije abakobwa batanu n’umuhungu umwe.
Umwana w’umukobwa umwe w’imyaka 7 n’umuhungu w’imyaka 9, bavuze ko ababakubaguye ari abasirikare bo mu gihugu c’Ubufaransa.
Abandi bakobwa bavuga ko ababakubaguye bava mu basirikare ba Georgia.
AP ivuga ko Al-Hussein, yashikanye ivyo birego mu nzego za Buraya, Georgia n’Ubufaransa mu ndwi iheze.

Kaje Elie wakiniraga Espoir Basketball Club yerekeje muri Patriots Basketball Club, akaba agiye kuyikinira mu myaka itatu.
Kaje Elie agiye muri Espoir asangayo mugenzi we Mugabe Aristide wari na kapiteni w’iyi kipe.
Elie atangaza ko yamaze kwerekeza muri Patriots, akaba amaze iminsi akorera imyitozo mu ikipe ya Patriots mu rwego rwo kwitegura imikino ya shampiyona ya 2015-2016, izatangira tariki ya 27 Ugushyingo.
Uyu mukinnyi avuga ko agiye gufasha Patriots kugera ku ntego yihaye yo gutwara igik
... 
innyi ibyo atajyaga abona muri Espoir, ariko akaba atarashatse ko bitangazwa.
Kaje yagize ati “kuri njye icya mbere bizamfasha cyanatumye njyayo ni ukuzamura urwego rwanjye mu mikinire,ndizera ko ibyo nzafasha Patriots ari ukugera ku ntego zabo bafite zo gutwara ibikombe byo mu Rwanda n’ibindi byose tuzagenda twitabira, yego mvuye mu ikipe ikomeye, ariko ngiye mu yindi ikomeye nk’uko Patriots yabigaragaje ubwo yatsindaga Espoir umukino umwe mu irushanwa ry’amakipe yabaye ane ya mbere (Play offs)
...
e ya Espoir muri 2011 akaba ariyo kipe yonyine yari yarakiniye.
Ubwo ikipe ya Espoir yatwaraga irushanwa ry’Akarere ka gatanu (Zone V) muri 2013 uwo mukinnyi ntabwo yari muri iyo kipe, kuko yari akiri muto.
Elie yatwaye n’igikombe cy’Akarere ka gatanu (Zone V) y’abakina ari 3 ba 3 mu ikipe y’igihugu muri uyu mwaka mu irushanwa ryabereye mu Rwanda.
Uwo mukinnyi yafashije Espoir Basketball Club kugera muri 1/2 cy’imikino y’Akarere ka gatanu (Zone V) yabereye mu Rwanda muri uyu mwaka.

Nkuko ino nkuru tuyikesha ikinyamakuru gikorera muri Nigeria, bo bavuze ko abakobwa baba mugace ka ” Lagos ” yuko kenshi mukuja gusenga bagenda bambaye impuzu ngufi cane bityo bigatuma abahungu baba bari murusengero badashobora gukurikirana ikiba cabajanye ikindi naco ngo ni ukutubaha ahantu baba bari kuko ngo uravye aba ari ahantu hiyibashe bityo ngo kuja gusenga bambaye nkakuriya bisa naho bopfuma bigumira mu rugo.
Kwiyamiriza zino nyambaro sibwo bwambere bibaye muri Nigeria kuko ngo bama bavuze ariko abakobwa bamwe na bamwe baguma bica amatwi bakarenga kumategeko, ubwo guhera ubu umwanzuro wafashwe n’abayobozi bamashengero ndetse bafatanije ni nzego z’umutekano, nuko ubu bagiye kuzoza barahana abo bose begenda bambaye impuzu zitikwije.

Umuyobozi ku ishuri rya Mbeya mu majyepfo ya Tanzania yahagaritswe ku kazi azira amashusho yakwirakwijwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga agaragaza umwana w’umuhungu wari wateraniweho n’abarimu bari kumukubita.
Muri ayo mashusho y’amasegonda 37, hagaragaramo abagabo baryamishije uwo munyeshuri hasi, bari kumukubita imigeri n’inshyi.
Ubuyobozi muri Tanzania bwatangaje ko bwatangiye iperereza ngo hamenyekane abo barimu babikoze.
BBC yatangaje ko uwo mwana bigaragara ko yakubitiwe mu cyumba cy’abarimu.
Umuyobozi w’ishuri ryisumbuye rya Mbeya, Margarey Haule yamaze guhagarikwa ku kazi azira ko ntacyo yakoze na nyuma yo kubona ayo mashusho y’abarimu be bakubita umunyeshuri.
Ayo mashusho bigaragara ko yafashwe tariki ya 28 Nzeli, uwayafashe akaba ari umwarimu mugenzi w’abo ndetse nawe akaba yatangiye guhatwa ibibazo n’abashinzwe iperereza.

Uyu mugabo yari umwe mu bagize Guverinoma ya Amerika kuko umwanya w’Umunyamabanga wa Leta muri iki gihugu ni nk’uwa Minisitiri mu Rwanda.
Ukwegura kwe kuje nyuma yaho mu minsi ishize yasabye imbabazi bikurikiye ingendo 26 z’indege yakoze uhereye muri Gicurasi zigatwara amadolari ya Amerika ibihumbi 400 asaga miliyoni 330 Frw.
Muri Guverinoma ya Amerika, abayobozi bose usibye abafite aho bahuriye n’ibibazo by’umutekano w’igihugu, nta n’umwe wemerewe gufata indege ya wenyine agiye mu kazi ahubwo batega iza rusange bagiye mu kazi.
Abandi bayoboziz batatu muri Guverinoma ya Trump bari kugenzurwa kubera gukoresha indege za bonyine kandi zihenze mu gihe bagiye mu ngendo z’akazi.
Itangazo rya White House rivuga ko Trump yemeye ubwegure bwa Price kandi ko yagennye Don J Wright nk’Umunyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe ubuzima w’agateganyo. Wright yari asanzwe ari Umunyamabanga wa Leta wungirije ushinzwe ubuzima.
Price yahise aca agahigo ko kuba ariwe Munyamabanga wa Leta ushinzwe ubuzima weguye amaze igihe gito kurusha abandi, iminsi 231 gusa.

Amakuru duhabwa n’urubuga rw’iradio y’abafaransa RFI yo kuri uwu wa kabiri amenyesha ko imbere yuko aba ubu umenyereza w’umurwi Al-Ahly wi Al-Gadaref mu buseruko bwa Khartoum, Salma al-Majidi, yabanje kumenyereza imirwi y’abakiri bato nka Al-Hilal wi Omdurman, hamwe na ville jumelle wo muri Khartoum.
Umumenyereza Al-Majidi yaramenyereje imirwi y’abagabo yo mu cicaro ca 2 nka Nile Halfa na Al-Nahda anayihesha intsinzi mu mahiganwa yo mu mu gihugu ca Sudani, amenyesha ko muri we, umupira w’amaguru ariwo umuha umunezero wa mbere ubaho kw’isi.
N’aho ata mategeko abuza urukino rw’umupira w’amaguru ku bigeme mu gihugu ca Sudani, Reta yaho ntitera intege abigeme bafise impano yo gukina urwo rukino.

Canada igiye gushyira ahagaragara inzira izakurikizwa mu kongera gufungura imipaka, igihe ibisabwa bizaba byujujwe.
Ibyo byazatuma abaturage bakingiwe mu buryo bwuzuye, babasha kongera kwinjira mu gihugu batagobye kujya mu kato kongerewe iminsi.
Icyiciro cya mbere cyo gufungura imipaka kizatangira ubwo 75 kw’ijana by’abemerewe gukingirwa, bazaba bamaze guhabwa urukingo rumwe rwa COVID-19 na 20 kw’ijana bamaze guhabwa urukingo rwa kabiri.
Kuri ubu, abanyakanada binjira mu gihugu bagomba kubahiriza akato k’iminsi 14 yuzuye.
Amakuru yabanje gutangazwa kuri Twitter ya Katie Simpson w’ibiro ntaramakuru bya Canada, wavuze ko itangazo riza gusohoka mu masaha ari imbere uyu munsi.
Minisitiri w’umutekano w’abaturage wa Canada, ari nawe ushinzwe umutekano w’imipaka, ntacyo yahise ashaka gutangariza ibiro ntaramakuru Reuters, dukesha iyi nkuru.

Nyuma y’uko agahenge k’iminsi ine kari kemejwe hagati ya Israel na Hamas karangiye kuri uyu wa Mbere, impande zombi zemeranyije ko hongerwaho indi minsi ibiri kugira ngo guhererekanya imfungwa n’abatwawe bunyago bikomeze.
Mu bagomba kurekurwa harimo n’Abanyamerika bafunzwe na Hamas.
Umwe mu bayobozi ba Hamas yavuze ko bahisemo kongera iminsi y’agahenge kugira ngo abarwanyi bayo Israel ifunze ibarekure kandi imfashanyo ikomeze kugera ku baturage ba Gaza bahunze intambara.
Ibiro by’Umukuru w’Ameri
... 
utse kurekurwa, akaba uwitwa Abigail Edan warekuwe ku Cyumweru, asubizwa benewabo bashoboye kurokoka amasasu ya Hamas mu bitero byabaye taliki 07, Ugushyingo, 2023.
Guverinoma ya Qatar niyo yatangaje iby’aka gahenge k’indi minsi ibiri kuko ni yo isanzwe ihuza impande zihanganye.
Ubuhuza bwa Qatar bwagize akamaro kanini kuko hari n’indi nkunga yahawe abahunze Gaza irimo no kubagazaho gazi yo gutekesha.
N’ubwo ari uko ibintu bimeze, Hamas ishinjwa ko iri kurekura abana ariko igasigarana ababyeyi b
...
u benshi Hamas yatwayeho iminyago ariko bitazwi aho baherereye.
Uyu mutwe kandi, binyuze mu magambo y’umwe mu bantu bawo bakomeye witwa Izzat al-Risheq, uvuga ko ingingo yo kurekura abasirikare ba Israel izaganirwaho ku ruhande.
Ngo ntaho ihuriye no kurekura abasivili.
Hamas yavuze kenshi ko izarekura abo basirikare ari uko Israel nayo irekuye abarwanyi bayo yatakiye ibihano ibashinja iterabwoba.
Hagati aho kandi impande zihanganye zemeza ko igihe cy’agahenge nikirangira, zizasubukura intambara.

Ikipe ya APR FC yamaze gushyiraho Kapiteni mushya ugomba gusimbura Buregeya Prince wasezeye kuri izo nshingano bitunguranye
Ikipe ya APR FC nyuma yo gusezera kwa Buregeya Prince, yamaze gushyiraho Kapiteni mushya kubera ikibazo uyu mukinnyi yagiranye n’abayobozi.
Ku munsi wo kuwa gatandatu ikipe ya APR FC yanganyije n’ikipe ya Gaadiidka FC yo mu gihugu cya Somalia mu mukino ubanza wo gushaka itike yo gukina imikino y’amatsinda ya CAF Champions League nyafurika.
Nyuma y’uyu mukino mu ikipe ya APR FC hatangiye kuvugwamo amakuru menshi atari meza ashingiye kuri uku kutitwara neza mu kibuga ndetse n’abayobozi ntibabyishimira kugeza aho bagiye mu rwambariro aho abakinnyi bari bari barabatonganya cyane bibanda kuri Buregeya Prince wari uyoboye abakinnyi bose mu kibuga.
Buregeya Prince nyuma yo gutonganwa akabwirwa nabi atari uko bamwifurizaga ibibi ahubwo ari uko bifuzaga intsinzi kuri uyu mukino ariko uyu mukinnyi yabyakiriye nabi ndetse ahita afata umwanzuro asezera ku gukomeza kuyobora abakinnyi baramwinginga ariko arabyanga birangira bafashe umwanzuro wo gutora undi, hatorwa Ombarenga Fitina yungirizwa na Shaiboub.
Ikipe ya APR FC igiye gukomeza kwitegura umukino uzaba ukomeye kuri uyu wa Kane uzayihuza na Gaadiidka FC wo kwishyura. Uyu mukino nawo uzabera hano mu Rwanda kuri Kigali Pelé Stadium.

Leta y’uburundi imenyesha ko igiye kurungika abasirikare bayo kugarukana amahoro n’umutekano mu buseruko bwa republika iharanira intwaro rusangi ya Congo. Abo basirikare bakaba bagiye kurungikwa mw’ico gihugu mu rwego rw’akarere ka afrika y’ubuseruko. Bikaba vyatangajwe kuri uyu wa kabiri n’umunyamabanga ntayegayezwa w’inama nkuru y’igihugu ijejwe umutekano hari mu ntara ya Rumonge (mu bumanuko bw’uburundi).
Pierre-Claver Nzisabira asigura ko abasirikare bamaze kurungikwa muri Congo bari mu rwego rw’ugufashanya hagati y’uburundi n’igihugu ca Congo. Uwo munyamabanga agahanura abanyagihugu bo mu ntara ya Rumonge muri rusangi kurikanura kugira ntihabe abova muri Congo ngo baze kudurumbanya umutekano w’igihugu c’uburundi.
Tubibutse ko Igisirikare c’uburundi kiri mu gihugu ca Congo ku mugaragaro kuva kuwa 15 Myandagaro 2022 mu ntumbero y’imigenderanire hagati vy’ivyo bihugu bibiri hisunzwe ivyo abategetsi b’uburundi bavuga. Ariko kiri mu kinyegero mu bumanuko bw’intara ya Kivu kuva muri kigarama 2021 gifashanijwe n’imbonerakure , ivyo uburundi bwagumye buhakana ko atangabo zabwo ziri muri Congo.

Ghana yiyongereye mu bindi bihugu byateye intambwe mu koroshya ingamba zo kurwanya Covid-19, ihagarika itegeko risaba abagiye ahahurira abantu benshi kwambara agapfukamunwa, mu gihe ubwandu bw’iki cyorezo bugenda bugabanuka ndetse kikaba gihanganye no gufungura ibikorwa bizamura ubukungu.
Mu ijambo Perezida wa Ghana, Nana Akufo-Addo, yavugiye kuri televiziyo ku wa 27 Werurwe 2022, yatangaje ko ku bantu bakingiwe mu buryo bwuzuye, ibikorwa bihuza abantu bigomba gusubukurwa kandi ko bitakiri ngomb
... 
mibare y’abandura Covid-19 yagiye igabanuka cyane ku Mugabane wa Afurika muri rusange.
Ghana ifite abantu barenga ibihumbi 160 banduye Covid-19 mu gihe abandura ku munsi babagabanutse cyane.
Perezida Akufo-Addo yakanguriye abaturage b’igihugu cye gukomeza kubahiriza amabwiriza y’isuku arimo gukaraba intoki no kwirinda ahari umubyigano ukabije.
Ishami ry’Umuryango w’Abibumbye ryita ku buzima, OMS, ryatanze impuruza ku bihugu byo kuri uyu mugabane byahagaritse ibyo gushyira mu kato abantu bafite i
...
mu kiganiro yagiranye n’itangazamakuru ku wa 24 Werurwe, yavuze ko kuba ibihugu biri kurwana no gusubiza mu buryo ibikorwa by’ubukungu n’imibereho ari ibintu byumvikana ariko ko icyorezo kigihari bityo ko koroshya ingamba bikwiye kwitonderwa.
Afurika iri inyuma y’ibindi bice by’isi mu kugira abaturage bakingiwe Covid-19 kuko abagera kuri 15,6% gusa ari bo bakingiwe mu buryo bwuzuye ugereranyije na 57% ku rwego rw’isi.
Abanduye Covid-19 ku mugabane wa Afurika bose hamwe bagera kuri miliyoni 11,3.

Agira ati “Turasaba ko ishyirwa ku bwishingizi bwa mituweli kugirango tujye tuyibona bitworoheye.”

ra kumara igihe kirenze umwaka umwe, mu gihe ku batuye mu mijyi igeza ku myaka ibiri.

Ikindi ni uko ngo uyifite imufasha kubohoka, agashobora kwigira, akagira agaciro mu muryango nyarwanda kuko ataba akeneye umurandata ngo amuyobore aho ashaka kujya.

...
utwaye ikinyabiziga amubona.
Gusigaho irangi ry’umweru ni ukugirango uyibona amenye ko ifitwe n’ufite ubwo bumuga.
Iyo nkoni yemejwe na Loni mu 1964 nk’ikimenyetso cy’abafite ubwo bumuga.
Mu Rwanda abafite ubumuga bwo kutabona basaga ibihumbi 57.
Dr Kanimba avuga ko iyo nkoni ari inyunganirangingo cyangwa insimburangingo, bityo ko leta ikwiye kubunganira zikaboneka, dore ko ngo mu Rwanda zitabasha kuhaboneka, n’abaterankunga bari bafite bagabanutse nyuma ya COVID-19.

Umunyamidelikazi w’umwongereza Naomi Campbell yavugishije benshi ku mbuga nkoranyambaga nyuma yo kubasangiza ifoto ye yambaye ubusa yafatiye mu gihugu cya kenya mu ifatwa ry’amafoto yo gukoresha muri Vogue Magazine.
Naomi yashyize hanze iyi foto yafashwe ubwo yakoreragwa Photoshoot n’ikinyamakuru cyo mu bwongereza kizwi nka Vogue Magazine kizwiho kwandika ibijyanye n’imideli ndetse n’ubuzima bw’abanyamideli.
Kuri iyi foto uyu Munyamidelikazi yasangije abamukurikira ku rubuga rwa Instagram, agaragara yateye umugongo camera ndetse yambaye n’urunigi ’Chain’ ruzengurutse amayunguyungu ye.
Naomi Campbell aheruka mu gihugu cya Kenya muri Ugushyingo mu mwaka wa 2018,aho yaje gucumbika muri Hoteli izwi ku izina rya Lion in the Sun Hotel y’umuherwe w’umutaliyani witwa Flavio Briatore.
Naomi Elaine Campbell w’imyaka 49 y’amavuko ,ni umunyamidelikazi w’umwongereza,umukinnyi wa filime ndetse akaba n’umushabitsi,akaba yarinjiye mu mwuga wo kumurika imideli afite imyaka 15.

Umunya Tanzania watozaga Patriots,Henry Mwinuka agiye guhabwa akayabo ka miliyoni 45 FRW kugira ngo asinyire ikipe ya REG BBC nyuma yo kuyitwara igikombe cya shampiyona giheruka ubwo yari mu ikipe ya Patriots.
Mwinuka uherutse gutsindira amakipe muri Tanzania mu ijonjora rya mbere ry’irushanwa BAL,arasinyira REG BBC amasezerano y’imyaka 2 ashobora kongerwa bitewe n’uko azitwara, imuhe aka kayabo ka miliyoni 45 FRW.
Nkuko amakuru dukesha ikinyamakuru Funclub.rw abitangaza,uyu munya Tanzania yabengutswe n’ikipe ya City Oilers yo muri Uganda ariko yanga kuyisinyira kugira ngo yigumire mu Rwanda.
Mwinuka yagiye muri Uganda ahamara iminsi 5 aganira na City Oilers ikize cyane ariko birangira ahisemo kugaruka mu mujyi wa Kigali yakunze cyane utandukanye na Kampala yari yarabayemo mbere. Iyi kipe yamurengerezagaho $500 kuyo REG BBC izamuhemba.
Uyu mutoza azajya ahembwa ibihumbi 2000 by’amadolari (Hafi miliyoni 2 mu manyarwanda) buri kwezi nyuma yo kwanga $1500 iyi kipe yari imaze iminsi yifuza kumuhemba.
Henry Mwinuka yahesheje Patriots ibikombe 3 bya shampiyona mu myaka 4 yari amaze ayitoza ahagarika ubwami bwa Espoir BBC yari yarigaruriye shampiyona.
Muri shampiyona ishize,Mwinuka na Patriots ye batsinze REG BBC muri Playoffs imikino 4-3,nyuma yo guturuka inyuma akayishyura imikino 3-1 yari yamutsinze.

Urubyiruko rw’ishyaka riri ku butegetsi mu Burundi ruzwi nk’Imbonerakure rwinjiye muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo kurwana n’inyeshyamba za RED Tabara zirwanya u Burundi.
Iyi mirwano y’iyi mitwe ikomoka mu gihugu cy’u Burundi yabereye ahitwa i Tombwe mi misozi miremire i Mwenga muri Kivu y’Amajyepfo ho muri Repubulika ya Demokarasi ya Congo.

Iyi mirwano yahuje Imbonerakure na RED Tabara yemejwe kandi n’umuyobozi wa Batayo 121 ya FARDC n’ubwo atatangaje ibyangijwe n’iyi mirwano.

Ingabo z’iki gihugu cya Kameruni ziratangaza ko zivuganye aba-Boko Haram 30. Nk’uko radiyo ya leta y'igihugu ibisobanura, Boko Haram yinjiriye mu majyaruguru aho Kameruni ihana imbibi n’intara Borno yo muri Nigeria.
Borno ni ho Boko Haram yiganje cyane. Imirwanyo yatangiye kuwa mbere. Abasilikali ba Kameruni bavuga kandi ko bafashe intwaro nyinshi za Boko Haram. Umupaka wa Nigeria na Kameruni ufite kilometero 1,690.
Boko Haram yinjiye ikurikiye abasilikali ba Nigeria bagera kuri 480 bahunze imirwano bambukira muri Kameruni Bahageze bashyize intwaro zabo mu maboko y’ingabo za Kameruni, byo kwerekana ko batari baje bateye nk’uko leta ya Nigeria yabisobanuye. Perezida wa Kameruni, Paul Biya, yategetse ingabo ze guherekeza bagenzi babo ba Nigeria babazubiza mu gihugu cyabo.

Basketball : Berco Stars na Dynamo bagiye kwitabira Memorial Gisembe mu gisagara ca Kigali
Kuva ku munsi w’ejo aho bukera, igenekerezo rya 9 Ruheshi mu gisagara ca Kigali, hazotangura ihiganwa ry’urukino rwa Basket Ball, ryitiriwe Memorial Gisembe.
Ihiganwa rizokwitabwa n’imigwi itari mike yo muri kano karere( Rwanda, RDC n’Uburundi). Uburundi bukaba bwaserukiwe n’imigwi ibiri ; Berco Stars mu bigeme na Dynamo ku bagabo.
Umugwi wa Dynamo ukaba washizwe mw’itsinda rya B, urikumwe n’imigwi nka Espoir BBC ( Rwanda)- IPRC (RWANDA)- BOUNDARIES ( RDC).
Berco Stars nayo yashizwe mw’itsinda A,hamwe na IPRC (Rwanda),iryo tsinda ririmwo imigwi ibiri gusa.
Iryo higanwa rikaba ryama ritegurwa buri mwaka mu ntumbero y’ukwibuka uwitwa Gisembe yahitanywe n’urwimo rwaciye muri ico gihugu mu mwaka w’1994.
Umugwi wa Berco Stars ukaba wari umaze imyaka ibiri wikurikiranya (2015-2016), uyu mwaka bakaba biteguye gutwara ico gikombe n’ubwo batakiri kumwe n’ababafashije gutahukana ivyo bikombe ( Kalume Sifa Florence, Inès Nezerwe) , babarizwa muri Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amelika.

TANZANIA, AFRIKA – Ku minsi 11/12/2017 imirambo y’abasirikare 14 ba MONUSCO biciwe muri Republika Iharanira Demokrasi ya Congo yatahukanwe muri Tanzaniya.
Jean-Pierre Lacroix, waserukiye ONU yatangaje ko nakane azerekeza mumuji wa Goma kugira ngo abashe gukurikirana umutekano w’abasirikare ba ONU, bakomoka muri Tanzania bahakorera.
Nkuko tubikesha ikinyamakuru VOA, Lacroix yatangaje ko azifatanya n’abandi bayobozi bakorera mumuji wa Goma mu muhango wo kwibuka abo basirikare baguye k’urugamba. Yavuze ko azosura n’inkomeri zakomerekeye muri iki igitero cagabwe n’inyeshamba za ADF zikomoka muri Uganda.
Tubibutse ko abasirikare 15 aribo bishwe muri ico gitero, abandi 53 barakomereka. Andi makuru yemejwe n’ibinyamakuru byo muri Tanzania avuga ko hari abasirikare babiri (2) bafashwe amateka n’izi inyeshamba za ADF; ibi binyamakuru kandi bivuga yuko hataramenyekana irengero ryabo basirikare babiri.
TEGERA VOA:

Abakoresha basabwa kwiyandikisha no kwandikisha abakozi babo mw’ishirahamwe rijejwe gutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi INSS kuko kutabikora ari ukurenga amategeko kandi hari n’ibihano bitegekanijwe kuwutabikoze. Ivyo vyashikirijwe na Emmanuel Miburo arongoye ishirahamwe rijejwe gutegekaniriza kazoza abakozi INSS mu kiganiro yahaye ikinyamakuru UBUMWE kw’igenekerezo rya 14 Nzero 2020.Nk’uko yabimenyesheje, ngo igikorwa co guhimiriza amashirahamwe gutangira intererano abakozi bayo ni kimwe mu bikorwa v
... 
’abayabatangira badakurikije imishahara baronka, yamenyesheje ko ayemerewe gukorera mu gihugu angana na 33 nayo ayamaze kuja muri INSS ari 26, vyerekana ko 7 yemerewe ataraja muri INSS. Yaciye amenyesha ko n’aho bir’uko intambwe ikiri ndende ariko harimwo akigoro kuko ingorane ari nyinshi bivanye n’uko hariho n’abinjira ivyabo ugasanga ntibimeze neza, aremeza ko mu mwaka w’ 2019, hariho amashirahamwe asanzwe ari muri INSS yari ifise abakozi bake ariko bashoboye kuzana abandi benshi bari basanzwe
...

Yaheraheje atera akamo abakoresha kwiyandikisha no kwandikisha abakozi babo kuko ari ineza ya bose kandi bakwumva ko ari amategeko y’igihugu bategerezwa gukurikiza gutyo bakirinda ingorane zobashikira.

Isabu ya Corona Rwanda emedeki kuduka 17
Avandu vandi sita vakonyoreka nivirusi vya Corona mu kivara cha Rwanda.
Iwizara iya uvwahiri mukivara yiicho yakurandiza isabu mbya yeyo, nukudukiza avandu 17 avanyoreki nivirusi yiivyo kujagira urwa umundu wukutanga yanyoreka navyo irisiiza ryaari.
Kurondekana na amakuva kutura mu wizara yeyo, avandu avaveye nivirusi yiivyo vaveeye engereka na vachuuyi mukivara yiicho vwangu ndi, naveye mu umukari murara kutura Ivufaransa nindi umwaneve wimieri 10.
Mukivara cha Albania, eserekari yakutuma amajeshi kuzimbarabara kuniga avamenyi kuva mu zinyumba zyavo ku zisa 40 izizanga vujira kari murara kutura ichova.
Orogendo yiirwo rwakuvugurwa inyiima wa avamenyi varara kuhuhiza amarago gahanwa muritanga ndi avandu vataa kogehiza irigenda-genda, kuri inzira ndara yukwigal’la il’landa rya Corona.
Avaraiya izierefu 120 vakuchura mukivara zana kutura Italy, uwa vavezaa ku miyinzi, yiyi uvuti nivurandaa ndi avanyingi vanyara kuva nivahamba ivirusi yiivyo tayari.
Avandu 2 vaveye kwiitwa na Corona mukivara cha Albania, hagati ha 76 avahamba ivirusi zana.

Umukinnyi Henrikh Mkhitaryan wahoze akinira ikipe ya Manchester United akayivamo mu kwezi gushize yerekeza muri Arsenal,yatangaje ko umutoza wa Arsenal Arsene Wenger azi kubana neza n’abakinnyi kurusha Jose Mourinho wa Manchester United.
Mkhitaryan yishimiye uko Wenger afata abakinnyi be
Uyu musore wabuze umwanya ubanza mu kibuga ubwo yari mu ikipe ya Manchester United,yatangarije ikinyamakuru SFR Sport ko umutoza Jose Mourinho agorana ndetse aba yifuza ibirenze mu gihe Wenger azi kubana n’abakinnyi be.
Yagize ati “Mourinho ahora yifuza ibirenze ku bakinnyi be mu gihe Wenger aba ashaka kugerageza kuba inshuti nabo kandi yumva neza ibibazo bafite.”
Mkhitaryan yafuze ko Mourinho asaba ibirenze abakinnyi be
Mkhitaryan yavuze ko amezi 18 yamaze mu ikipe ya Manchester United atamworoheye,gusa yishimira ibikombe yabashije gutwara muri iyi kipe birimo UEFA Europa League bitwaye umwaka ushize ndetse akabasha gutsinda igitego ku mukino wa nyuma.

Muri Leta zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Polisi yagaragaye mu mashusho ikubita mu kico ukekwaho Iterabwoba.
Ibi byabereye muri Leta ya Arkansas mu mujyi muto wa Mulberry kuri uyu wa 21 Kanama 2022, ubwo aba Polisi batatu bagaragaraga mu mashusho bakubita mu kico Umugabo witwa Randall Worcester w’imyaka 27 bamukekaho Iterabwoba no gusagarira abashinzwe umutekano.
Amashusho yo kumufata agaragaza umwe mu bapolisi amukubita ibipfunsi, undi amukubita amavi menshi mu mugongo, mu gihe uwa gatatu we yari amushikamije hasi, nyuma aza kujyanwa kwa muganga.
- USA : Abapolisi 7 bahagaritswe mu kazi bazira urupfu rw’umwirabura wapfuye mu buryo busa n’ubwa George Floyd
- USA : Uwishe George Floyd yahamwe n’icyaha
- USA : Uregwa kwica George Floyd yarekuwe ku ngwate ya miliyoni $1
- Israel : Umusaza w’imyaka 65 yashinzwe ivi ku ijosi bigarura isura y’urupfu rwa George Floyd
Umwe mu bari aho biba, agafata amashusho yagaragayemo aba Polisi batatu bakubita uyu mugabo, yumvikanye ababwira ngo “mwimukubita” Polisi imutegeka gusubira mu modoka ye.
- Advertisement -
Asa Hutchinson Guverineri waLeta ya Arkansas, yavuze ko ubu hari gukorwa iperereza kuri aba bapolisi hagendewe ku bimenyetso by’amashusho byatanzwe mu gihe aba bapolisi babaye bahagaritswe mu kazi.
Ni kenshi muri Amerika hagiye havugwa urugomo rukorerwa abakekwaho icyaha bikozwe na Polisi ndetse bamwe bakahasiga ubuzima. Ibyamenyekanye cyane bikanavugwa ni urupfu rwa George Floyd bikozwe na Polisi ya Minneapolis.

By Habumugisha Théoneste | Views : 10143 | Kuya 01-26-2017 09:34
Mu mukino wa shampiyona wahuje APR FC na rayon sport kuwa gatandatu tariki ya 21 Mutarama 2017, nibwo umukinyi wo hagati wa Rayon sport Niyonzima olivier bakunda kwita Sefu yagize ikibazo gikomeye avunika igufa ry'urutoki, bituma bucyeye bwaho ku cyumweru ahita ajyanwa gucishwa mu cyuma basanga yarangiritse bikomeye.
Niyonzima olivier Sefu mu bitaro bya CHKKuwa mbere tariki ya 23 nibwo Sefu yabagiwe mu bitaro bikuru bya Kigali CHK, asezererwa ku munsi w'ejo kuwa gatatu tariki ya 25.
Aganira n'umurashi.rw nyuma yo kuva mu bitaro, Sefu yagize ati:
"Naravunitse ubwo twakinaga na APR Fc, nagize ikibazo tuzamuka gukina umupira wo ku mutwe na Djihad, mu kumanuka naguye nabi, niho navunikiye, ubu narabazwe meze neza, barandekuye ngiye gukurikiranwa na Docteur Charles ( umuganga wa Rayon sport) noneho nyuma y'ibyumweru 4 nzagaruka hano CHK bandebere uko merewe, Umuganga yansabye ko ntakina kuko iri gufa bisaba ko ryitabwaho rigakira neza".
Sefu agiye mu mvune mu gihe abandi bakinnyi ba Rayon sport nabo bari bari mu mvune bazivuyemo barimo Thiery Manzi, Muhire Kevin na Ange Mutsinzi bo bamaze kugaruka bari kwitegura umukino wa shampiyona bafitanye na Kiyovu sport kuri uyu wa gatanu tariki ya 27 Mutarama 2017.

Ubushinjacyaha bw’u Rwanda burasabira umunyamakuru Jean Paul Nkundineza igihano cy’igifungo cy’imyaka 10 no gutanga ihazabu ya 5 000 000 z’amafaranga y’u Rwanda.
Buramurega ibyaha byo gutangaza amakuru y’ibihuha no guhohotera uwatanze amakuru. Ni urubanza ruburanishirizwa mu rukiko rw’ibanze rwa Nyarugenge.
Ibyaha ubushinjacyaha burega uyu munyamakuru bishingiye ku biganiro yateguraga ku rubanza rwa Dieudonné Ishimwe uzwi nka Prince Kid” wateguraga amarushanwa ya nyampinga w’u Rwanda.
Bumurega ko yibasiye Mutesi Jolly wigeze kuba nyampinga w’u Rwanda mu 2016. Uyu ni we wavuze ko mu marushanwa ya Nyampinga haberamo ihohoterwa rishingiye ku gitsina.
Nkundineza yabwiye umucamanza ko nta bihuha yatangaje kuko ibyo yakoraga byari mu rwego rw’akazi kandi agatangaza amakuru yariho y’ukuri.
Yasabye ko yagirwa umwere akarekurwa. Nkundineza yatawe muri yombi mu mwaka ushize wa 2023. Ariyongera mu bandi banyamakuru babiri bafunzwe bazira ibyaha bikubiye mu biganiro byo ku muyoboro wa YouTube.

Umuhagarikizi mpuzamakungu pacifque Ndabihawenimana yashizwe mu bahagarikizi bagiye guhagararira inkino za CAN U 20.
Akaba yashizwe muri urwo rutonde n’ishirahamwe ry’ umupira w’amaguru muri Africa CAF . Pacifique Ndabihawenimana akaba ari umuhagarikizi wo hagati mu kibuga mbere akaba ari nawe muhagarikizi w’Umurundi yashizwe muri urwo rutonde.
Mukamenya ko inkino za CAN U 20 zigiye gutangura kuva kumagenekerezo ya 2 gushika kumagenekerezo rya 17 Ruhuhuma . Amatsinda akaba ari abiri itsinda A hamwe na B .
Itsinda A harimwo imigwi nka : Niger , Africa y’epfo, Nigeria , Burundi Itsinda B nayo harimwo imigwi nka : Sénegak , Mali, Burkina Faso, Ghana .

Ikibazo cya Sadate MUNYAKAZI na depute Habineza gikomeje gufata indi ntera, noneho Sadate arasaba ko uyu mugabo yakwirukanwa mu ishyaka rye yishingiye.
Bwana MUNYAKAZI Sadate wigeze kuyobora kuyobora ikipe ya Rayon sport, yongeye gushyira ubutumwa ku rukuta rwe rwa twitter aho asaba abarwanashyaka b’ishyaka rya Green Party, ishyaka ryashinzwe na Bwana Frank Habineza, mu butumwa bwe Sadate yagize ati:”Ndashishikariza abanyamuryango b’inyangamugayo ba Green Party kwirukana vuba na bwangu Dr Frank 
... 
 gihugu ndetse no hanze, ku buryo bamwe bagarukaga ku gitekerezo cya Leta yakomeje ivuga ko idashobora kugirana imishyikirano n’abasize bakoze jenoside mu Rwanda, cyangwa uwo ariwe wese wagaragaye mu bikorwa byo kugambirira kongera gusesa amaraso y’Abanyarwanda.
Icyo nicyo gitekerezo Bwana SADATE yuririyeho maze ashyira kuri twitter ye ifoto ya Bwana Dr HABINEZA Frank agaragara asinziriye, maze ayivugaho amagambo akomeye aho yavuze ko Abanyarwanda birirwa bavunwa n’imisoro ariko bamwe bakayireng
...
ho amaboko ku buryo bamusezerera mu ishyaka, ndetse bamwe barakerensa ububasha bw’ubusabe bwa Sadate ku buryo yakumvwa.
Sadate MUNYAKAZI umugabo wayoboranye inkoni y’icyuma ikipe ya rayon sport yamenyekanye cyane ubwo yinjiraga mu buyobozi bw’iyo kipe, nyuma yo kwirukanwa nabi, yakomeje atanga ibitekerezo byinshi ndetse bitagiye bivugwaho rumwe binyuze ku mbuga ze nka twitter, ni umwe mu bantu yakomeje gusakirana n’abandi kubera imvugo zikakaye akunze gukoresha.
Gutanga ibitekerezo byahagariswe.

Itai Dzamara yihanze Robert Mugabe yatwara Zimbabwe, mu nyuma aburigwa irengero
Itai Dzamara ari mu bantu bakunda kwifatira mu gahanga Robert Mugabe, imbere yuko aburigwa irengero haraheze imyaka itatu.
Kuva ico gihe umuryango wiwe uracarindiriye inyishu, nkuko umumenyeshamakuru wa BBC ari Zimbabwe, Kim Chakanetsa avyigana.
Sheffra Dzamara ntarigera akubita ijisho umugabo Itai Dzamara, ku kiringo kiringo c'imyaka itatu.
Ubuzima bwiwe bwahindutse kuva mu gitondo c'itariki 9 ukwezi kwa gatatu 2015
... 
ca aranyika.
'Ni ba bahungu'
Hari umuntu acibuka neza ingene Bwana Dzamara yanyurujwe, ari nawe yamubonye ubwa nyuma - uwamumwa.
Inyuma y'imyaka itatu, biracamugora kuvuga ariko umuhendahenze ukemera kwatidondora, arakubwira ingene vyagenze.
Ico gihe mu gitondo, yariko akorana n'uwundi muntu amwa, ahantu ugenda iminota mike ngo ushike aho Bwana Dzamara yaba.
Iyo nzu yo kumweramwo yarasubiye gusigwa, ariko ico gihe hari ahantu hubakishijwe imbaho, hatagira amadirisha, aho ababanyi n'abakiriya baj
...
migenderanire n'amakungu, Sibusiso Moyo, yabwiye BBC ko igihe co kunyuruza abantu carangiye, ko leta nshasha yubaha ubuzima bw'umunya Zimbabwe uwariwe wese.
Ngarutse ku kibuga ca Africa Unity Square - cama gifise ivyo gikoregwamwo - Bwana Nyapfumbi nawe nyene avuga ko akirindiriye inyishu.
"Birambabaza. Iyo ndavye ifoto, nca ntangura kurira," niko uwo mugenzi wa Bwana Dzamara avuga, ijwi ricikagurika.
"Bari bakwiye kumushingurana iteka. Ni baba baramwishe, bari bakwiye kuduha ibisigarira vyiwe."

Bob Bradley: Swansea City yirukanye umutoza wayo
Swansea City yirukanye umutoza wayo Bob Bradley nyuma y'iminsi 85 gusa ayitoza muri shampiyona y'Ubwongereza.
Nyuma yo gutsindwa na West Ham 4-1 iwayo, Swansea irabura amanota ane gusa ngo igwe mu murongo utukura wo kujya mu kiciro cya kabiri.
Nyuma yo gustindwa ku wa Mbere, wari umukino wa karindwi itsinzwe mu mikino 11 itozwa na Bradley.
Bradley ni umutoza wa mbere w'Umunyamerika utoje muri shampiyona y'Ubwongereza nyuma yo gusimbura Francesco Guidolin ku itariki ya 3/12.
Umuyobozi wa Swansea Huw Jenkins yagize ati:
"Twumvise ko twagombaga gukora impinduka mu gice cya shampiyona gisigaye".
Yongeyehgo ati:
"Muri ibi bihe ikipe irimo bikomeye, tugomba kubona ibisubizo no kwivana mu bibazo."
"Ku bwanjye nta kindi mfite uretse gushima Bob. Ni umugabo mwiza; umuntu mwiza witanze ku kazi. Uburyo akora biratangaje kandi tumwifurije amahirwe ejo hazaza."
Bradley yatoje Leta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, Misiri na Stabaek muri Norvege ava muri Le Havre mu kwezi kwa Mbere asimbura Guidolin.
Igihe yageraga muri Swansea, ikipe yari iri ku mwamba w'umurongo utukura ariko ku kinyuranyo cy'ibitego gusa.
Abatoza basigaye barimo Alan Curtis na Paul Williams bazasigara bari ku mirimo y'ubutoza by'agateganyo.
Bazatangirana umukino bazakiramo Bournemouth mu mpera z'umwaka.

Ikipe ya APR FC ifite gahunda yo gutandukana n’abakinnyi 10 basanzwe bakinira iyi kip,e gusa aba ntibarimo abanyamahanga bayo batandatu yaguze ubwo uyu mwaka wa shampiyona watangiraga.
Amakuru Umurengezi.com wamenye , nk’uko umwe mu bantu ba hafi b’iyi kipe yabitangaje, yavuze ko icyemezo cyamaze gufatwa ko hari abakinnyi batazakomezanya na APR FC mu mwaka wa shampiyona utaha nyuma yo kugaragaza urwego rutanyuze iyi kipe.
Muri aba hakaba harimo ba myugariro Nzotanga Fils, Buregeya Prince na Plac
... 
i Nshimirimana Ismael bakunda kwita Pitchou gusa kugeza ubu ubuyobozi bwa APR FC bukaba butangaza ko nta munyamahanga biteguye kurekura mu bo baguze nk’uko uwaduhaye amakuru abyemeza.
Abanyamahanga twazanye ntabwo ari abakinnyi babi ndetse mu bo duteganya gutandukana na bo ntabwo barimo. Kereka tubonye ikipe ishaka kugira uwo igura tukabyumvikanaho ni bwo twamutanga. Kugeza ubu bose bazahaguma kuko bagifite amasezerano.
Mu bakinnyi b’abanyamahanga ikipe ya APR FC yari yaguze, urebye babiri ni bo
...
atewe n’imvune, nubwo bivugwa ko ari we wari wahenze iyi kipe.
Kugeza ubu ikipe ya APR FC ikaba iri mu biganiro n’abatoza batandukanye barimo Aritz Lopez utoza Nouadhibou yo muri Mauritania, Julien Chevalier wa ASEC Mimosa na Adel Amrouche watoje ikipe y’igihugu ya Tanzania n’u Burundi.
Amakuru dufite ifite ni uko mu ntangiriro za Kamena iyi kipe izaba yabonye umutoza mushya usimbura Thierry Froger utazongererwa amasezerano aho kuri ubu akiri no mu Rwanda cyane ko agifatwa nk’umutoza w’iyi kipe.

Ubwo yari mu ndege asubira i Vatican mu rugendo amazemo icyumweru ku mugabane wa Aziya, Papa Francis yatangarije abanyamakuru ko mu mpera z’umwaka wa 2015 agomba kugira ibihugu bya Afurika asura birimo Ubugande.
Papa Francis yatangaje ko ibihugu bibiri by’ingenzi yumva uruzinduko rwe rwo ku mugabane wa Afurika ruzibandamo ari igihugu cya Centrafrique ndetse n’icya Uganda.
Yakomeje avuga ko uru rugendo rwigijwe inyuma ho gato kubera indwara indwara ya Ebola yagaragaraga kuri uyu mugabane, ariko ubu hakaba hagiye gutangira kurebwa igihe gikwiye rwazaberaho.
Urugendo ruheruka rw’umukuru wa Kiliziya Gatorika ku mugabane wa Afurika rukaba ari urwa Papa Bedigito wa XVI muri 2011 ubwo yasuraga Benin. Uru rugendo rukaba rwari rwabanjirijwe n’urwo yagiriye na none kuri uyu mugabane kuva kuwa 17 kugera kuwa 23 Mata 2009 muri Cameroun na Angola

Nahimana Jonathan ari ku rwego rushimishije
Kuri uyu wa gatatu uheze igenekerezo rya 12 Ruhuhuma 2020, umugwi wa KMC wari wakiriye umugwi wa Coastal Union mu rukino rw’indwi ya 21 y’ihiganwa ryo muri Tanzania urwo rukino rukaba rwarangiye iyo migwi ibiri inganije 0-0.
Umunyegori w’intamba Nahimana Jonathan akaba yaravyifashemwo neza mu gukura imipira ikomakomeye y’abakinyi ba Coastal Union gushika aho urukino rurangira banganje 0-0.
Ibinyamakuru vyo mu gihugu ca Tanzania vyaciye bivyuka vyandika y’uko Nahimana Jonathan ari umunyegori akomeye naho vyoshika umugwi wa KMC ukagira ubuzima bubi mw’ihiganwa ryo muri Tanzania VPL vyizera y’uko afise ububasha bunini bwo gukina mu migwi ikomeye yo muri Tanzania.
Si ibinyamakuru vyo muri Tanzania vyonyene bimaze gushimishwa n’urugero Jonathan ariko ndetse n’umumenyereza wa Simba Sc igihe bahura na KMC bakayitsinda ibitsindo 2-0 bigoranye yashoboye kubwira abamenyeshamakuru y’uko yashimishijwe n’ingene Jonathan yasamye mbere kuriwe niwe yotowe nk’umukinyi mwiza yaranze urwo rukino.

Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Canada, Justin Trudeau, yageze mu Mujyi wa Kigali kuri uyu wa Gatatu, tariki ya 22 Kamena 2022, aho yitabiriye Inama y’Abayobozi Bakuru b’Ibihugu na za Guverinoma zo mu Muryango w’Ibihugu bikoresha Icyongereza, CHOGM.
Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Canada, Justin Trudeau, yasesekaye ku Kibuga Mpuzamahanga cy’Indege cya Kigali i Kanombe ahagana saa Kumi n’Ebyiri n’Igice z’umugoroba.
Akihagera yakiriwe n’Umujyanama wa Perezida mu by’Ubukungu, Francis Gatare, mu cyubahiro gikwiye umu
... 
riye iri kubera mu Mujyi wa Kigali kuva ku wa 20 Kamena, izasozwa ku wa 26 Kamena 2022.
Mu butumwa yanyujije ku rukuta rwa Twitter ye, Minisitiri w’Intebe wa Canada, Justin Trudeau yavuze ko mu gihe azamara mu Rwanda azaganira n’abayobozi mu gushaka ibisubizo by’ibibazo ibihugu byinshi bifite birimo ingaruka zatewe n’intambara y’u Burusiya muri Ukraine, imihindagurikire y’ibihe n’ubuzima burushaho guhenda.
Justin Trudeau, agiye gusura u Rwanda mu gihe mu minsi ishize yagiranye ikiganiro na Perez
...
mbi n’ingingo zireba isi muri rusange, bifitemo inyungu.
Abayobozi bombi banaganiriye ku ngaruka Afurika yagizweho n’intambara u Burusiya bwagabye kuri Ukraine yatumye ibiciro bitumbagira by’umwihariko kuri uyu mugabane.
Inama ya CHOGM yitabiriwe n’abantu barenga 5000, baturuka mu bihugu 54 bigize uyu muryango wa Commonwealth uhuriza hamwe abaturage miliyari 2,6.
Canada ni kimwe mu bihugu byatangiranye na Commonwealth ubwo yashingwaga mu 1926, mu gihe u Rwanda rwinjiye muri uyu muryango mu 2009.

Iyo myitozo irasozwa hagaragazwa uburyo intwaro zitandukanye, inini n’intoya zakoreshwa mu gutanga umusanzu kuri diviziyo y’abasirikari bari guhanana n’umwanzi.
Hakoreshwa intwaro zirasa mu buryo bwose, haba izirwanishirizwa mu kirere, izirwanishirizwa ku butaka, aho bishoboka hagakoreshwa n’izirwanishirizwa mu mazi.
Imyitozo yahabwaga ingabo zo muri Diviziyo ya gatatu y’ingabo z’u Rwanda ikorera mu Ntara y’Uburengerazuba iyoborwa na Maj. Gen. Alex Kagame.
Iyi myitozo ngarukamwaka ibaye ku nshuro ya gatatu. Iyaherukaga yabaye mu kwezi k’Ugushyingo 2017, ikaba yarakurikiwe na Perezida wa Repubulika Paul Kagame, ari nawe mugaba w’ikirenga w’ingabo z’u Rwanda.
Iyi nkuru turacyayibakurikiranira.

APR FC yagarutse mu Rwanda
Nyuma yo gutsindwa na Djoliba igitego 1-0 mu mukino wa CAF Confederation Cup muri Mali, APR FC yagarutse mu Rwanda kwitegura umukino wo kwishyura ndetse n’umukino uzahuza APR FC na Espoir ku wa kabiri w’icyumweru gitaha.
APR FC igomba kwitegura umukino wo kwishyura na Djoliba ugomba kuba mu mpera z’icyumweru gitaha. APR FC yahise igaruka vuba kugira ngo ibe yakwitegura uyu mukino dore ko yanatsinzwe umukino ubanza. Si uyu mukino gusa APR FC ifite mu cyumweru gitaha, kuko ifite umukino wa shampiyona uzayihuza na Espoir kuwa kabiri, APR FC ikaba iri bukore imyitozo uyu munsi saa kumi n’igice kuri sitade ya Kigali i Nyamirambo yitegura iyi mikino yombi ifite mu cyumweru gitaha.
Mugiraneza, Kapiteni wa APR FC akaba yevuze ko n’ubwo Djoliba ari ikipe nziza ariko ko na APR FC ari ikipe nziza. Yagize ati " Twagize ikibazo cy’ubushyuhe bwinshi cyane, Djoliba ni ikipe nziza ifite abasore barebare ariko na APR ni ikipe nziza tugomba gukora ibishoboka byose tukaba twasezerera iyi ikipe."
Mugiraneza yasoje ashimira cyane abafana ba APR FC . Ati " Ndagira ngo nshimire cyane abafana ba APR FC sinarinzi ko tubasanga hano ku kibuga cy’indege muri aya masaha akuze ariko ndabashimiye byimazayo nanabasaba gukomeza kudushyigikira."
TANGA IGITEKEREZO

Kuri uyu wa gatatu igenekerezo rya 08 Ndamukiza 2020, umushikiranganji w’amagara y’abantu mu Burundi Thaddée Ndikumana yararemesheje ikiganiro ku bamenyeshamakuru cerekeye uko ikiza ca Coronavirus cifashe muri iki gihe. Muvyashikirijwe, ntamurwayi mushasha ariyongerako kandi na bamwe batatu amagara yabo ngo yifashe neza. Yaragize ico avuga ku nkuru zivugwa ku rucanco rwoba rushaka kugeragerezwa ku barundi.
Muganga Ndikumana yashikirije ko ibipimo vyo gusuzuma ubugira kabiri vyakozwe kuri uyu wa 
... 
owe ingwara ya Coronavirus vyerekanye ko ata mugera wa coronavirus bafise. Muri abo, 21 bapimwe ubugira kabiri, nayo 13 bwari ubwa mbere bapimwe.
Izindi ngingo zo gukinga zo bite ?
Ingingo yo kumaza iminsi 14 mu bibanza vyabigenewe , ku bantu bose binjiye mu gihugu bavuye mu mahaga ngo yafashwe ku neza yo gukingira imiryango n’igihugu ikiza ca #Coronavirus. Gushika uyu munsi, mu bantu 2936 binjiye mu gihugu, 2261 barakwije iminsi 14 baca barataha mu mihana iwabo kandi ngo amagara yabo ameze neza
...
 n’ahagwarira indembe mu Bitaro Prince Régent Charles. Ubushikiranganji bwo kubungabunga amagara y’abantu no kurwaya sida butangaje icese ko butazigera bwemera namba ko urucanco urwo ari rwo rwose, rugeragerezwa ku benegihugu b’abarundi » .
Yarangije ahumuriza abenegihugu ngo batekane, babandanye imirimo yabo ariko bitwararike gusumba ingingo zo kwikingira ikiza ca coronavirus, na cane cane gukaraba n’amazi meza n’isabuni, kwirinda kuramukanya dukorana mu minwe, duhoberena canke duhana inkokora.

Real Madrid yatsinze Valencia ibitego 2 kuri 1 ariko byageze ku munota wa 85 Valencia ikiyoboye umukino.
Mu mpera z'iki cyumweru muri Espagne shampiyona yakomezaga aho bari bageze ku munsi wabo wa gatanu Real Madrid igomba gusura Valencia. Uyu mukino wari ishiraniro kuko Real Madrid yari iyoboye urutonde rwa shampiyona ndetse ikurikirwa na Valencia ariko banganya amanota.

Indege itwarwa n'izuba yazengurutse inyanja ya Pacific
Indege itwarwa n'imirasire y'izuba, yarangije urugendo rwayo rw'iminsi itatu hejuru y'inyanja ya Pacific maze igwa muri California nta kibazo.
Iyo ndege yitwa - Solar Impulse - yanyuze hejuru ya Golden Gate Bridge mu mujyi wa San Francisco yerekeza muri leta ya Hawaii.
Igice cyo hejuru cy'iyo ndege gitwikiriwe n'amabuye atanga amashanyarazi y'imirasire y'izuba.
Ibaba ryayo risumba iry'indege yo mu bwoko bwa Boeing 747 ariko ipima munsi ya kimwe k'ijana cy'uburemere bwayo.
Uru rwari urugendo rwa cyenda iyo ndege ikoze igerageza kuzunguruka isi rwatangiye mu kwezi kwa gatatu k'umwaka ushize i Abu Dhabi.
Urwo rugendo ariko rwakomeje gutinzwa kubera ibikorwa byo kuyisana nyuma yaho amabuye yayo atangiye gushyuha cyane.

Hari muri 2002 ubwo Sir Alex Ferguson yarimo yitegura kuva muri Man U ku nshuro ya mbere, mu rwego rwo kureba umutoza umusimbura abayobozi ba Manchester United bakaba baragiye kuvuga n’umutoza wa Arsenal ariwe Arsene Wenger ngo barabe niba yakwemera gusimbura Ferguson.
Nkuko amakuru ya Daily Star abivuga ngo Arsene Wenger yahise ahakanira abayobozi ba Man U atazuyaje nyuma bituma Ferguson afata icyemezo cyo gukomeza gutoza Manchester United kugeza muri 2013.
Man U ikaba yiyongeye ku rutonde rw’amakipe akomeye yagiye ashaka kuvana Wenger muri Arsenal gusa we akayakurira inzira ku murima andi muriyo ni Real Madrid, Fc Barcelone ndetse na PSG yagiye kumushaka ubugira 3.

Umuyobozi w’Umujyi wa Kampala Erias Lukwago na Dr Kiiza Besigye bose batavuga rumwe na Guverinoma ya Uganda batawe muri yombi na Polisi mu gitondo cyo kuri uyu wa 9 Mutarama. Lukwago yatawe muri yombi hamwe na Allan Ssewanyana, nyuma yo gutangaza ko atazahagarika inama yateganyaga gukorera ku cyicaro gikuru cya Jeema kandi ko azabikora mu buryo butanyuranyije n’amategeko yongeraho ko atazarebera ibera mu mujyi wa Kampala ngo agomba kurwanira igitabo cy’amategeko mu gihugu.
Lukwago avuga ko ngo Museveni agomba kurinda igitabo cy’amategeko yarwaniriye ubwo yari mu ishyamba. Itabwa muri yombi rya Lukwago ryabaye nguma y’uko Dr Besigye nawe atawe muri yombi na Polisi nyuma yo gukubita polisi agacika ava Kasangati ajya Kampala ariko nyuma akaza gufatirwa ku cyapa cya tagisi agahita ajyanwa kuri Sitasiyo nkuru ya Polisi.
Kugeza ubu bagenzi b’aba bagabo nabo batavuga rumwe na Leta ; Moses Kasibante, Betty Nambooze and Asuman Busalirwa baracyari mu maboko y’ababataye muri yombi babavanye mu ngo zabo.
Ibindi kuri iyi nkuru kanda hano

Kuri uyu wa Gatatu taliki ya 7 Nzeri 2011 abakandida senateri bari mu gikorwa cyo kwiyamamaza; mu Ntara y'Amajyepfo biyamaje mu karere ka Huye. iki gikorwa gihagarariwe na Prezida wa Komisiyo y'Igihugu y'AmatoraProf KARANGWA Chrysologue afatanyije na Komiseri muri Komisiyo y'amatora. Komiseri muri Komisiyo y'Igihugu y'Amatora yerekanye abakandida maze anibutsa buri cyiciro: Inteko itora abakandida ndetse n'indorerezi, inshingano zacyo maze nyuma aha umwanya ungana n'iminota icumi buri mukandida ngo avuge imigabo n'imigambi ye imbere y'ibi byiciro byose. Iki gikorwa cyo kuvuga imigabo n'imigambi cyakorwaga mu cyumba cy'inama harimo umukandida umwe abandi basohotse ndetse n'abashinzwe kuzabamamaza nyuma ugezweho hakurikijwe uko banditse kuri lisiti y'itora akaba ariwe winjira mu cyumba ngo nawe avuge imigabo n'imigambiye. Iki gikorwa cyarangiye neza abakandida bemerewe kwiyamamariza mu karere ka Huye.

Ikinyamakuru Maeil Business News cyatangaje ko mbere uru ruganda rwari rwatangaje koruzashyira ku isoko uyu mwaka telefone zingana na miliyoni 310, gusa kubera ibibaoz by’ubukungu hashobora gukorwa miliyoni 280.
Umusesenguzi mu bijyanye n’ubucuruzi muri icyo gihugu Shinhan yabwiye iki kinyamakuru ko uru ruganda rushobora kugabanya ibyo rukora kugera ku kigera cya 35% ndetse izi mpinduka ko zishobora gukomeza kugera umwaka utaha.
Ku rundi ruhande ariko hari amakuru avuga ko uruganda rwa apple narwo kuti telefone rwagombaga gushyira hanze, hazagabanyukaho miliyoni 20.
Zimwe mu mpamvu zitangazwa ziri gutuma izi nganda zikomeye ku isi zigabanya ibyo zikora benshi bahuriza ku bukungu bw’isi butifashe neza,intambara y’u Burusiya na Ukraine yatumye henshi ku isi ifaranga rita agaciro n’icyorezo cya Coronavirus.

«Ngo nivyaba ngombwa barapfunga umutumba wose»
«Vyaratugeze ahantu nico gituma twasidukanye n’iyonka, icaha nicatwagira baragomba badupfunge umutumba wose, twakurikiye ababanyi bacu kugira ngo ntibapfungwe bonyene kandi dupfa twese».
Ayo namwe mu majambo ashikirizwa n’abanyagihugu bo ku mutumba wa Ruhanza wo muri komine Giheta mu ntara ya Gitega aho bazindutse bugariza umurwa mukuru w’iyo komine ya Giheta inyuma y’uko mw’ijororo ryakeye haraye hishwe umutamakazi w’imyaka y’amavuka 74 azwi kw’izina rya Maragarita Nzobonimpa nayo umushingantahe wiwe arakomereka.
Uwo musaza akaba yaraye agandaguwe n’abanyagihugu bo kuri uwo mutumba wa Ruhanza barimwo abana hamwe n’abuzukuru biwe bamwagiriza ko yoba ari umurozi. Abantu bagera ku mirongo ibiri na batatu akaba aribo baciye bafatwa bakaba gushika ubu bapfungiwe ku murwa mukuru w’iyo komine ya Giheta.
Musitanteri w’iyo komine ya Giheta, Alexis Manirakiza amenyesha ko mu gihe bumviye ko haguye iryo bara, ngo barahejeje bafata umuhungu w’uwo muhisi hamwe na nyumbakumi yamara mu nyuma abanyagihugu bose bo kuri uwo mutumba ngo bakaba bahavuye bizana kw’ikomine basaba nabo ko bopfungwa mu gihe batorekura abo bari bamaze gufatwa, aho badatinya n’ukwemanga ko baraye bikuye umwansi kw’izosi.
Yamara naho biri uko, Manirakiza amenyesha ko ubutungane butegerezwa gukora kuko atawoshigikira ko abanyagihugu bihanira mu gihugu gisanzwe kirimwo amategeko.

Mu gihe Cristiano Ronaldo na Lionel Messi bategerejwe muri saison nshya,bo baafite urugamba bagomba kubanza kurwana byaba byiza bakarurwana saison itaratangira neza ngo bayitwaremo neza.
Aba basore bombi bahuje ibibazo n’urukiko rwo mu gihugu cya Espanye kubera kunyereza imisoro.Lionel Messi we umaze imyaka akurikiranwa ho icyo cyaha yaje kugihamwa we na se umubyara akatirwa imyaka 2 ariko muri icyo gihugu imyaka 2 ntago bayifungwa ahubwo bishyura izahabu.
Cristiano Ronaldo we nta gihe gishize ashinjwe icyo cyaha bikanamuteranya bikomeye n’ikipe ye ya Real Madrid aho akekwa kunyereza miliyoni 14 z’ama euro nubwo ataragihamwa nyamara nawe ntago yorohewe.
Aba basore bakaba bazahura mu gikombe cya Supercup mu kwezi kwa 8 ubwoFC Barcelone na Real Madrid bazafungura saison nshya mu gihugu cya Espanye.

Inama y’umutekano ya ONU yasubiye kugabisha Igihugu ca Koreya ya Ruguru, kur’uyu wa gatanu, kubijanye no guhagarika ibitero vyaco vya nucleaire. Ivyo vyakurikijwe no kwongerereza abantu cumi na bane ku basanzwe bari k’urutonde rw’abafatiwe ibihano, hamwe n’amashirahamwe ane.
Ibihano vyafatiwe abo bantu bijanye no kwakwa impusha zo gufata ingendo, hamwe n’amwe mu matungo yabo, bivuye ku bitero vya nucleaire Koreya ya Ruguru ibandanya gukora. Nikki Haley, aserukira Reta Zunze Ubumwe za Amerika, ari nayo yafatikanije n’Igihugu c’Ubushinwa mu gusohora iyo ngingo, yatangaje ko ingino zose zizofatwa mu gihe Koreya ya Ruguru ibandanije gukora ivyo bitero.
Abenshi mu bari k’urutonde rw’abafatiwe ibihano kubera ibitero vya nucleaire Koreya ya Ruguru ikora bari mu zabukuru. Umwe muri bo n’umugabo w’imyaka mirongo icenda n'ibiri, azwi kw’izina rya Ro Yong Mu, asanzwe ar’icegera c’umuyobozi w’umugwi wa Reta ujejwe ibikorwa vya gisirikare n’umutekano.
Amakungu amenyesha ko atewe ishavu n’uburyo Koreya ya Ruguru ibandanya kwica amatwi. Tubibutse ko Koreya ya Ruguru imaze gukora ibitero vya misile balistike bishika kw'icenda kuva uyu mwaka w’ibihumbi bibiri na cumi n'indwi utanguye.

...

Ubushinjacyaha bw’u Burundi bwashyize hanze amazina asaga 30 y’abantu bakekwaho uruhare mu gushaka guhirika ubutegetsi bwa Perezida Nkurunziza mu 2015, biganjemo abahoze mu nzego nkuru z’umutekano, abanyapolitiki n’abakora muri sosiyete sivile.

Intumwa yiyariye ya ONU ku kibazo cya ONU David Nabarro avuga ko impungenge zireba ikwirakwira rya EBOLA ubu ziganje mu burengerazuba bwa Sierra Leone.
Aha ni mu nkengero z’umujyi wa Port Loko , mu murwa mukuru Freetown ndetse no mu majyaruguru ya Gineya. Yasobanuye ko Umuryango w’Abibumbye n’abafatanya bikorwa bawo bazashyir aingufu nyinshi muri utwo turere kugirango barandure Ebola.
Nabarro yabwiye Ijwi ry’Amerika ko ubwiyongere bw’ubwandu bwa EBOLA mu burengerazuba bwa Sierra Leone bwatewe n’uko abaturage baho batitabiriye inyigisho bahawe zo kwirinda Ebola.
Nabarro avuga ko hagikenewe ibindi bitanda byo gushyira mu bigo bivura Ebola, kandi ko hakenewe abakozi bo mu rwego mpuzamahanga. Yagize ati, hakenerwa hafi abantu 300 bo gukora mu kigo gifite ibitanda by’abarwayi 50.

Eduardo dos Santos wayoboye Angola imyaka 38 yishwe n’uburwayi
José Eduardo dos Santos wabaye Perezida w’Angola mu gihe gikabakaba imyaka 40 yitabye Imana azize uburwayi nk’uko byatangajwe ku mbuga nkoranyambaga za Perezidansi y’Angola kuri uyu wa Gatanu.
Byatangajwe ko Eduardo dos Santos wari agejeje ku myaka 79 y’amavuko, yashizemo umwuka ahagana saa tanu n’iminota 10 z’amasaha yo muri Esipanye.
Yaguye ku Bitaro bya Barcelona Teknon nyuma y’uburwayi yari amaranye igihe kinini cyane nk’uko byatangajwe na Perezidansi y’Angola.
Umuvugizi w’Ivuriro Barcelona Teknon aho yari arwariye, yabwiye Ibiro Ntaramakuru by’Abongereza (Reuters) ko yavurwaga neza nk’uko bisanzwe ariko ntiyashaka kugira ibindi atangaza ku burwayi n’urupfu rwe.
Dos Santos yavurwaga guhera mu mwaka wa 2019. Ikigo cy’Igihugu cy’itangazamakuru cya Portugal cyatangaje mu kwezi gushize ari bwo yashyizwe mu byumba byahariwe indembe muri iryo vuriro rya Barcelona.
Dos Santos wamenyekanye cyane nk’umwe mu baperezida bayoboye igihe kinini yavuye ku butegetsi mu myaka itanu ishize.
Ubuyobozi bwe bwaranzwe n’intambara z’urudaca zamaze imyaka igera kuri 30. Izo ntambara zahuzaga inyeshyamba za UNITA yaje kunesha mu 2002, ndetse n’ubushyamirane bwagiye buterwa n’ibikomoka kuri peteroli.
Mu mwaka wa 2017 ni bwo Dos Santos yasimbuwe na Perezida João Lourenço, wahagarariye Ishyaka riharanira Ubwigenge bw’Angola (MPLA).

Ni ibwiriza ryashyizweho umukono na Perezida wa Repubulika y’u Burundi Evariste Ndayishimiye, wategetse ko guhera kuri uyu wa Gatanu tariki 15, Mutarama, 2021 abakozi bo mu biro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu bose bagomba kujya bambara agapfukamunwa aho bari hose.
Itangazo ry’Ibiro by’Umukuru w’u Burundi kandi bivuga ko umuntu wese aje kwaga serivisi cyangwa gusura Ntare Rushatsi House[niko ibiro by’Umukuru w’Igihugu byitwa] agomba kuba yambaye agapfukamunwa n’amazuru neza.
Uburundi buri gufata ingamba zikomeye zo kurinda abaturage kwandura no kwanduzanya COVID-19 nyuma y’uko imibare y’abayandura izamutse mu gihe gito gishize.

Umuhanzi wo muri Uganda Ykee Benda biravugwa ko mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize yaje i Kigali kureba umukobwa basigaye bakundana.
Inkuru y’urukundo hagati ya Ykee Benda n’umukobwa witwa Akayesu Sharon uzwi nka Shazz yatangiye kuvugwa mu cyumweru gishize.
Ykee Benda ubwe yemeje ko umutima we yayeguriye uyu mwari w’umunyarwandakazi ndetse ntibahwema kubyerekana biciye mu mafoto bacisha kuri Instagram.
Ykee Benda yaje mu Rwanda mu mpera z’icyumweru gishize nta kindi kimuzanye kitari ukureba uyu mukobwa.
Ku wa Gatanu Ykee Benda na Shazz ngo basohokeye muri hoteli yitwa Kaizen iri Nyabugogo mu Mujyi wa Kigali.
Ni ku nshuro ya mbere bari babonanye amaso ku maso kuva batangira gukundana.
Sharon uri mu rukundo na Ykee Benda yatangiye kwamamara ubwo yavugwaga mu rubanza rwarezwemo Davis D, Kevin Kade n’umufotozi witwa Thierry.
Bashinjwaga kumusambanya kandi ataruzuza imyaka y’ubukure. Baje kugirwa abere bararekurwa.
Uyu mukobwa yongeye kugaruka mu itangazamakuru ubwo Kwizera Olivier yirukanwaga mu Mavubi kubera ikiganiro bagiranye kuri Instagram kandi uyu munyezamu ari mu mwiherero w’Amavubi.

Burundi : Abanyarwanda 20 bafungiye mu ntara ya Cibitoke
Abanyarwanda babarirwa muri 20 bafungiye muri Kasho ya Rugombo na Cibitoke mu ntara ya Cibitoke muBurundi nyuma ya gutabwa muri yombi na polisi y’icyo gihugu.
Amakuru dukesha urubuga rwa Radiyo na Televiziyo by’u Burundi avuga ko bafashwe kubera kuhaba nta byangombwa bafite ndetse no kwica umuco w’Abarundi.
Nubwo nta makuru arambuye yagaragajwe ku byo aba Banyarwanda bafungiwe, Guverineri w’indi Ntara ya Kirundo, Révérien Nzigamye, aherutse gutangaza gahunda bafite yo gufata “ibyigomeke by’Abanyarwanda” bakabyohereza mu Rwanda.
Ibi yabitangaje ahakana ko u Burundi budacumbikiye Interahamwe nk’uko byemezwa n’abatavuga rumwe na Leta ahubwo bufite Abanyarwanda batubahiriza amategeko nk’uko hari n’Abarundi bameze nka bo.
Mu kiganiro n’abanyamakuru cyabaye tariki 7 Gicurasi 2014, Nzigamye yemeje ko u Burundi bwakoze ubushakashatsi bugasanga mu Burundi habarizwa bene abo Aanyarwanda basaga 400, hakaba hari gahunda bufitanye n’u Rwanda kuba babifata bakabyohereza mu Rwanda.
Yakomeje yemeza ko hasanzwe hari gahunda yo guhererekanya abagizi ba nabi bakora ibyaha mu Rwandabakomoka mu Burundi cyangwa Abanyarwanda babikorera mu Burundi.
